10801.desc: The blazing gate opens, scorching the very air. Under cover of billowing smoke, countless enemies have poured forth. Don't let them slow you down.
10801.name: The Blazing Gate

10802.desc: Hellish flames roar all around. You must conserve your strength as you dispatch the approaching foes. The path looks longer than anticipated.
10802.name: Burning Battlefield

10803.desc: As you clear the gate, the heat fades, but the onslaught intensifies. Behind you, enemy reinforcements leap down from above the gate.
10803.name: Dancing Sparks

10804.desc: Enemy resistance has subsided. One last group blocks your way. Dispatch them, and you can finally escape the influence of the Eight Sealed Gods' Gate.
10804.name: Hellfire Whirlwind

10810.desc: Boiling water gushes from deep within the earth, and falls on you like scalding rain. But you must focus on the enemies at hand.
10810.name: Incessant Heat

10811.desc: As Lugina suggests, the lack of resistance so far is perplexing. You should seize the chance to press forward.
10811.name: Before the Storm

10812.desc: The craggy ground is slick with mud, and dotted with sinkholes connected by fierce streams. This footing is every soldier's worst nightmare.
10812.name: Battle at the Geyser

10813.desc: Rock crumbles underfoot, unleashing a jet of scalding water and nearly sending you sprawling. The slightest misstep could cost your life.
10813.name: Scalding Spray

10814.desc: The expanse of countless hazardous geysers finally nears its end. An ominous feeling grows, as you realize it won't continue to be this easy...
10814.name: Torrential Floods

10820.desc: The end of summoning arts? With the final battle impending, you have no time to consider the ramifications. But, it remains at the back of your mind.
10820.name: Budding Doubt

10821.desc: All around you lie mercilessly crushed ruins, now covered with young forest. The foreboding silence tempts the mind to wander.
10821.name: Silent Ruins

10822.desc: Moment by moment, the final battle draws near. How can you hope to overcome the might of the Holy Emperor, who overshadowed even the Summoners of Old?
10822.name: Waltz of Impatience

10823.desc: Amidst the deep green, you exhale deeply. At your side are Tilith and your companions. Lament will only sap your resolve. It's time to move on.
10823.name: Into the Deep Green

10824.desc: Bertz's words seep into your heart like poison. But if you can't shake off something like this, you'll never stand a chance against the Holy Emperor.
10824.name: The Sea of Trees

10830.desc: The demon Kalon has watched over the seals of many lands. This must be a trial to gauge your worthiness. Show your strength!
10830.name: Guardian of the Seal

10831.desc: Karna Masta defeated even the Summoners of Old, but with the Oracle Maiden's power, you can challenge him. You must hold on to even the faintest hope.
10831.name: Atop the Wreckage

10832.desc: This place has been so utterly ravaged that its original purpose is a mystery. Such is the power of the Holy Emperor...
10832.name: The Ravaged Land

10833.desc: The broken ground makes for treacherous footing, but just brushing the surroundings with your hand could blast you with electricity. Be cautious.
10833.name: Scorched Heart

10834.desc: Some of the surrounding wreckage is relatively intact. You marvel at the unfamiliar materials and workmanship. Could these be otherworldly relics?
10834.name: Violet Lightning

10840.desc: Ark will attack with everything he has. Remain steadfast as you face him, and convince him to aid your cause.
10840.name: Oracle and Prayer

10841.desc: You have never seen such a peaceful expression as on Ark's face. You silently gaze upon the gentle, yet sad countenance.
10841.name: Fading Light

10842.desc: You have at last reached the heart of the brilliantly shining structure. This area is also heavily damaged, leaving you to wonder what it once was.
10842.name: Heart of Radiance

10843.desc: This must have once been a very important location. Some massive power lingers here, throwing off dazzling flashes of light.
10843.name: Sparkling Castle

10844.desc: As your eyes adjust to the light, you find your way outside the structure. The sudden plunge into blackness leaves you disoriented and vulnerable.
10844.name: Coming of the Light

10850.desc: You emerge in a place defying description. It must be the ruins of a city...but nothing makes sense. So this is how this other world looks.
10850.name: Vexing Worldscape

10851.desc: Cutting through a maze of alleys, you find yourself indoors, then underground. You wonder how the inhabitants avoided losing their way.
10851.name: Incomprehensible Path

10852.desc: The cities filled with otherworldly technology you have seen before were filled with light, but this place becomes darker with each step.
10852.name: Eerie Shadows

10853.desc: Lights flicker here and there, but only make it more difficult to peer into the shadows. Before your eyes can adjust, you press on ahead.
10853.name: Conquer the Dark

10854.desc: On the outskirts of town, you feel a familiar air of destitution and desperation. You suppose the bad areas are not much different in any world.
10854.name: Darkest Night

10860.desc: You have finally reached the place where the Holy Emperor Karna Masta was sealed. Make haste to find Ilia's power for the remaining Summoners of Old.
10860.name: Blinding Fog

10861.desc: Parting the thick mist, you search for any sign of Ilia. You feel the overpowering aura of a mighty god, but can find no trace of the Oracle Maiden.
10861.name: The Domain of Despair

10862.desc: You must buy time while Ark awakens Ilia's power. You may be in over your head...but you know you can count on your companions.
10862.name: Unknowable Power

10863.desc: Were it not for the timely arrival of your companions, all would be lost. But now you must regain your strength. Believe in your friends.
10863.name: Bonds of Friendship

10864.desc: Ilia and Tilith have merged their powers, opening a route to strike down Karna Masta. The Summoner pours everything they have into the final battle!
10864.name: The Holy Emperor

10870.desc: The Holy Emperor's physical form has been annihilated. However, two seals remain. As the Summoner searches for the secret, who should appear but...
10870.name: Final Seal

10900.desc: The Summoners arrive in Mildran, where Karna Masta's soul is imprisoned. Who could be waiting for them in these lands?
10900.name: Sealed Soul

10901.desc: Mildran, the former home of great royalty. The ruins still visible in the thin fog remind you of those long-gone days of luxury.
10901.name: Luxurious Ruins

10902.desc: There are those who came to this place of their own will, to face the past. But the "Rejecting Seal" gives them second thoughts.
10902.name: Rejecting Seal

10910.desc: Amidst the falling ash, you eventually reach something like a town center. Many months and years of history lay in ruins all around you.
10910.name: Conquer the Ashes

10911.desc: Wordlessly you progress through the lonely scene. What areas of this capital would most interest Paris if she were here?
10911.name: Wanderer in the Ruins

10912.desc: As you progress through the capital, Ark's demeanor seems to grow more serious. Perhaps he senses something waiting ahead.
10912.name: Misdeeds Draw Near

10920.desc: Waiting in the floating castle was a black mass of residual energy and the wandering souls of heroes. Ark steps forward alone for this fated battle!
10920.name: Resolve and Right

10921.desc: Ark has reconfirmed his strength after defeating the Six Heroes. Along with the Summoner, he moves forward towards his goal anew.
10921.name: Six Heroes' Will

10930.desc: The story of a hero toyed with by the gods to bring back a loved one. In the end will he find hope, or despair...?
10930.name: Where Souls Slumber

10970.desc: With Karna Masta totally defeated, Ark is free to be with Ilia, now released from her seal. Yet, his worries haven't dissipated...
10970.name: Wandering Hermit

20000.desc: Welcome to the newly discovered realm of Cordelica. A huge gate towers above you, as if it were beckoning Summoners inside...
20000.name: Inferno Gate

20001.desc: Beyond the huge gate unfolds a fiery cave. It doesn’t look like you’ll find anything worthy of investigation here, so keep moving forward.
20001.name: Cave-Dwelling Assassins

20002.desc: You’ve stumbled into a thriving monster habitat. Judging by the hungry glint in their eyes, you’re probably the first human they’ve seen in centuries.
20002.name: The Bandits’ Feast

20003.desc: There’s no respite from the scalding heat. A gust of hot wind blasting through the maze of caverns.
20003.name: Hot Gale’s Caress

20004.desc: A cold wind dries the sweat from your forehead. Could the exit be nearby? You spot a shaft of light, but it’s guarded by a formidable-looking foe...
20004.name: Before the Flame Princess

20010.desc: You exit the infernal cave and come upon a huge waterfall spanned by a breathtaking rainbow. Finally, some beautiful scenery to soothe your weary soul.
20010.name: The Foot of the Rainbow

20011.desc: A monster ambush interrupts your reverie with the scenery. Dispose of them and continue with your investigation.
20011.name: Beneath the Cascade

20012.desc: You pass behind the cascading waterfall and continue to the next area. Lugina’s warning plays in your mind, but you’re too curious to turn back now.
20012.name: Behind the Waterfall

20013.desc: The roar of the waterfall cascading around you drowns out the sound of approaching demons. They lurk in the water and shadows, waiting for their moment to pounce.
20013.name: An Invisible Presence

20014.desc: Just as you’re about to exit on the other side of Ignia Falls, a watery monarch emerges from behind the waterfall. He’s come to expel the intruders in his domain...
20014.name: The Battleaxe Descends

20020.desc: On the other side of the huge waterfall a vast forest stretches as far as the eye can see. According to Lugina, the monsters here are the most dangerous you’ve faced.
20020.name: Entering the Foliage

20021.desc: The overgrown foliage deep inside the forest is maze-like in its complexity. What lies on the other side?
20021.name: Labyrinth of Trees

20022.desc: Even after the world has been reduced to rubble, the souls of bandits continue to exist deep within the forest. They target travelers’ valuables, just like when they were alive.
20022.name: The Bandits’ Trap

20023.desc: The bandits tell of a dragon who protects all the trees in the forest. Could that be where this distant roar is coming from?
20023.name: The Roaring Warrior

20024.desc: A massive tree stretches into the heavens from the center of the forest. There's no chance of passing through the forest's twisting maze without its blessing.
20024.name: Master of Lomass

20030.desc: Do as Lugina says and defeat the hordes of monsters dwelling within the fortress. You’ll be able to continue with your investigation afterwards.
20030.name: The Moonlit Fortress

20031.desc: Scores of monsters block your path forward, but there’s no turning back now. Show them who’s boss by attacking them head-on.
20031.name: Rushing the Enemy

20032.desc: You break through the frontal defenses only to find yourself ambushed yet again, but this time from above! Time to quiet this raging beast.
20032.name: Assault from Above

20033.desc: Two monstrous birds, more ferocious than anything else you’ve encountered, lie in wait to stop the advance of any would-be intruders into their territory.
20033.name: Cold-Hearted Sentries

20034.desc: Danger awaits you in the great courtyard at the center of Valtan Fortress. Defeat whatever it is to complete Lugina's mission.
20034.name: A Peaceful Courtyard

20040.desc: You arrive at the Tower of Light hot on the heels of Lugina and Paris. Could the mystery of Cordelica really lie within its radiant and lofty walls?
20040.name: The Shining Tower

20041.desc: The roar of an ancient dragon reverberates inside the walls of the tower. Only those able to conquer their fear are worthy of scaling the tower’s heights.
20041.name: A Roar from the Darkness

20042.desc: The higher you climb, the tougher the monsters seem to get. Amid all the chaos, the sound of a beautiful and bewitching singing voice beckons you ever higher.
20042.name: Deadly Melody

20043.desc: Nothing poses a greater threat to Summoners than monsters of opposite elements cooperating to launch a combination attack. Fire and water, for instance...
20043.name: Phoenix and the Sea Monster

20044.desc: Countless monsters appear as if to drive the intruders from their hallowed tower. But what are they protecting? Part of Cordelica's past, or some other hidden truth?
20044.name: Dance of the Knight

20045.desc: As the fight continues to escalate, the sound of gunfire mixed in with the roar of monsters hints at even more danger to come. Could Lugina have found something?
20045.name: Howls and Gunshots

20046.desc: An overwhelming presence emanates from the top of the tower. Could it be the legendary power bestowed upon those who’ve heard the voice of the gods?
20046.name: The Voice of God

20050.desc: A mine shaft winds its way in the direction of the Giant's Ruins. Monsters fond of the dank conditions lurk in the shadows, their fangs occasionally glinting in the darkness.
20050.name: Into the Darkness

20051.desc: Spots of nature continue to exist even in this most man-made of environments. Unfortunately, nature isn’t always man’s ally...
20051.name: Protector of Nature

20052.desc: The dark mineshaft continues to beckon weary travelers deeper inside its murky maw. Monsters can smell fear, so whatever you do, beware your sweet scent.
20052.name: Howls in the Void

20053.desc: You emerge from what you thought was a never-ending tunnel to be greeted by a bright light, only to find out the light was actually a flash of lightning.
20053.name: Where Lightning Strikes

20054.desc: An evil air pervades the pitch-blackness of the mine’s innermost reaches. Exhausted by their travails, despair nibbles at the heart of any weary traveler on this road.
20054.name: Unifier of Demons

20055.desc: A glimmer of hope crosses your mind as you feel the route slowly ascending, though the air of death continues to loom about in the shadows around you.
20055.name: Hunter of Death

20056.desc: A faint light glimmers at the end of what seemed like never-ending darkness. Standing before it, a nightmarish monster rears its head, revealing a bewitching smile.
20056.name: Rondo of Nightmares

20060.desc: You come to some vast and ancient ruins, cloaked in an air of solemnity. The time of Cordelica’s reckoning is soon at hand. Prepare yourself for the battle ahead.
20060.name: Wandering the Ruins

20061.desc: You follow Lugina’s orders and launch yourself into the path of the marauding monsters. You have to give it all you've got on the front lines!
20061.name: Last Light of the Ruins

20062.desc: As if drawn by the heat of battle, monsters from far and wide descend upon your position. You can’t afford to rest until Lugina has defeated Grantos!
20062.name: Beneath Ebony Wings

20063.desc: Locked in the throes of battle, a strange sensation overcomes you momentarily. You don’t know what caused it, but you decide to track its source...
20063.name: A Guiding Star

20064.desc: The carvings here are even more ornate than those near the entrance of the ruins. A fresh gash runs horizontally across one of the giant frescoes. What could've done this?
20064.name: The Spoiled Fresco

20065.desc: Continuing deeper into the ruins in search of the strange sensation’s source, you come across souls driven mad mad by anger. What could have done this?
20065.name: The Meaning of Irate Souls

20066.desc: The source of the strange sensation is revealed in a legendary giants with powers rivaling those of the gods. Do you run, or stay and fight?
20066.name: Rampage of the Giants

20067.desc: After defeating the giants, you now face the toughest challenge of all in their king, Grantos. The final showdown to determine the fate of Cordelica is about to begin.
20067.name: The Giant God Awakes

20070.desc: There's a cavern just behind the Ignia Falls. A mysterious beast has awaken deep inside, seemingly disturbed by your battle with the giants. What could it be?
20070.name: The Amorphus Being

20100.desc: Now you can't rely on anything else but your own physical power. And although Tilith may be helping, you should stay alert.
20100.name: New First Steps

20101.desc: Even surrounded by enemies, at least you were able to meet with Lugina's subordinate, Reda. Watch how she fights.
20101.name: Battle Playbook

20102.desc: This is what it is to fight for yourself, feeling the resistance through your weapons. You can see how much you've depended on Summoning until now.
20102.name: Feeling Resistance

20200.desc: A bizarre scene of machines making machines unfolds before you. They make machines in Elgaia, too, but there is no comparison in scale.
20200.name: Mass-Production

20201.desc: Machines are everywhere you look. There's no sign of any people. Could this be related to the collapse Reda spoke of?
20201.name: Weapons Loaded

20202.desc: You've gotten used to fighting without Summoning. Even so, it might not go well if you run into a powerful enemy as you are now.
20202.name: Incoming Iron

20300.desc: You've won the trust of a strange automaton. Your goal keeps moving further away. You've got to fight through swarming enemies to get there.
20300.name: Rescue Operation

20301.desc: The land around you is covered in broken machines, and the sharp debris makes for bad footing. You have to hurry or you'll lose sight of your goal.
20301.name: Buried Steel

20302.desc: Your target has slowed down. You're almost there. You've grown confident in your fighting skills, so now it's time to close the gap.
20302.name: Iron Mountains

20303.desc: Your target has stopped moving. However, you sense a powerful feeling of malice close by. You won't be able to avoid a difficult fight.
20303.name: Broken Machines

20400.desc: Hatch and Tull, you've picked up some unexpected companions on your journey. More importantly, these automatons seem oddly human.
20400.name: Path of Extinction

20401.desc: You proceed into the tower made of geometric crystal and metal. It looks like it was built for people to live in, but there's no sign of anyone.
20401.name: Uninhabited Tower

20402.desc: According to Hatch and Tull, humans vanished from this world long ago. Yet the city seems to be perfectly preserved...
20402.name: Soulless City

20403.desc: There are some mechanical experts and actual machines among those you can Summon, but are any of them connected to this world?
20403.name: Operational Status

20404.desc: Leaving Mersas, you're finally almost at the Information Tower. It would be nice if you could get there without trouble, but...
20404.name: Encounter the Unknown

20500.desc: You made it to the Information Tower, your present goal. You're able to use Summoning again for whatever reason, so you might as well start climbing.
20500.name: Tower of Knowledge

20501.desc: You've gotten used to fighting for yourself alongside Summoning. You feel like you've grown to understand why Karl and Seria fight this way.
20501.name: Data Overload

20502.desc: There's probably a device you can get information from on the top floor, but before that a powerful enemy you must fight awaits.
20502.name: Seek the Truth

20600.desc: You probably shouldn't be surprised, but it seems Bertz made it to this world first. Reda doesn't even need to tell you that you have to hurry.
20600.name: Order and Disorder

20601.desc: This wasteland is wildly different from the rest of Bectas. Is this an area they've extracted ores from in order to make machines?
20601.name: Extreme Development

20602.desc: You can see a building past the wasteland. That's probably your destination. What is the being that protects this world? Does this world have gods?
20602.name: Indifferent Lands

20603.desc: You feel something unpleasant, but it's not malice. Is it a premonition? Watch for dangerous enemies near the building as you advance.
20603.name: Death or Creation

20700.desc: As expected, the building was full of machines. It also seems to be full of enemies. Be careful, you don't know what else awaits you.
20700.name: Epicenter Survey

20701.desc: Massive numbers of machines are attacking. It's exhausting and there's no end in sight. Reda appears to be sick of it, too.
20701.name: Still Moving

20702.desc: Hatch and Tull seem to have told the truth about lacking combat abilities. Maybe this would have been easier if they could fight with you...
20702.name: Steady Movements

20703.desc: You hear an unnatural sound that you recognize. It seems a formidable foe you've fought many times awaits you. Take up your weapon and move forward.
20703.name: Ancient Wings

20704.desc: You've arrived at the central block. Find the being that protects Bectas, and your mission is complete. Yet you feel like you're forgetting something.
20704.name: Central Block

20705.desc: Lugina breaks through a wall and appears. You don't have time to ask questions. For now, defeat the massive automaton he called the "Divine Machine"!
20705.name: Departing

20800.desc: You've arrived at the building Reda discovered and was set on exploring. This place is clearly different from the other buildings on Bectas.
20800.name: Wildfire Lotus

21000.desc: The old castle ringed with a half-frozen lake like a moat makes you think of scenes from Grand Gaia. Who could possibly live here?
21000.name: Castle on the Lake

21001.desc: You can see the castle more clearly as you approach, and it really does seem similar to some ruins you've seen before.
21001.name: Snow-Swept Dawn

21002.desc: Did the culture of this world influence Grand Gaia just as the one on Bectas did? Or was it Grand Gaia that influenced this world?
21002.name: Cold Winds

21003.desc: The gate is right ahead of you. You can tell now that you're close. You're pretty sure you've seen extremely similar architecture on Grand Gaia...
21003.name: Frozen History

21010.desc: You were shocked to learn that humans fled to places other than Elgaia during the war with the gods. Are there other cases of this, as well?
21010.name: Town Under Attack

21011.desc: Fearing attack by the Mystical Wolf's minions, the townsfolk keep their doors shut tight. And thus the town itself is overrun with monsters.
21011.name: Abundant Monsters

21012.desc: The Mystical Wolf's change is probably related to this land's sealed god. If so, your survey will probably also help to save this world's people.
21012.name: Days of Collapse

21020.desc: Luciana has moved ahead despite Liana's effort to stop her. It seems our presence has had negative effects. You have to catch up to her.
21020.name: Commence Pursuit

21021.desc: Luciana believes the legends, and probably thinks the gods are still humanity's enemies. Liana seems terrified of Tilith, too.
21021.name: Beautiful Cruelty

21022.desc: According to Liana, it's not especially cold right now. This is the normal weather all year. Elgaia might seem like a paradise next to this world.
21022.name: Polar Life

21023.desc: The snow on the trees sometimes falls to the ground noisily. How did the people of this world survive in such a cold land?
21023.name: Shadowed Woods

21030.desc: The three of you proceed along the lake's shore. The lake is frozen in patches, and it seems like a person could walk out onto the ice in some places.
21030.name: Frozen Lake Waters

21031.desc: There was no snow in Tull's world, so advancing through it is a real struggle. You have to walk ahead and pack down the snow.
21031.name: Snowbound Advance

21032.desc: The problem with this world is the enemies that hide in the snow and leap out at you. If you get thrown into the lake, you might even die of the cold.
21032.name: Rippling Waters

21033.desc: You're almost to the site of one of the shrines. However, you're well aware from experience that "almost there" is a dangerous place to be.
21033.name: Shining Ice

21040.desc: There's a fantastical scene unfolding in the sky. You want to observe closely, but there's no time if you intend to catch up to Luciana.
21040.name: Sky Phantoms

21041.desc: These snowfields seem to be filled with lurking enemies, but with Hatch scouting ahead you should still be able to avoid most fights.
21041.name: Silver Waltz

21042.desc: You can see far across the vast snowfields, but the enemies hide in the snow and ambush you at times. Stay alert for their presence as you advance.
21042.name: Glittering Snowfall

21043.desc: You're close to the border between the snowfields and the ice lake. Powerful enemies often lie in wait in places like this. Keep your wits about you.
21043.name: Shining Snowscapes

21050.desc: The sealed god of this land appears from nowhere. Beat it and you'll complete your mission here. All you can do now is fight with all you have!
21050.name: Encroaching Threats

21051.desc: It seems that the Mystical Wolf was actually this world's sealed god. You need to find a way to win before you fight it again...
21051.name: The True Target

21052.desc: The cold, dry air makes your nose hurt. Reda seems to be freezing, too, but Luciana and Liana appear used to it.
21052.name: Trail of Frozen Blood

21053.desc: Enemies attack frequently, but at least it warms you up a bit. It might be nice to fight for yourself under these circumstances.
21053.name: Secret Signposts

21054.desc: The air has shifted. There must be an exit nearby. The sisters say that it's still quite a ways to the polar regions even after you leave this cave.
21054.name: Searching for Exits

21060.desc: You can't let sudden meetings and attacks confuse you. They attacked after determining you were a Summoner of the Summoners' Hall, which must mean...
21060.name: Random Encounter

21061.desc: The Abel Faction was ahead of you in this world, too. How much information are they getting before the Summoners' Hall does?
21061.name: Darkness a Step Ahead

21062.desc: You can't tell how deep the cracks in the massive ice blocks go. All you can do is take extreme care in where you step as you advance.
21062.name: Hellish Avalanche

21070.desc: Cold air...no, a presence so tense it hurts. This alone tells you the immense power of the sealed god. Just what is this sealed god?
21070.name: Divine Territory

21071.desc: Although you're fairly used to it by now, things are still harder when your Summoning is restricted. You have to get stronger.
21071.name: Utmost Extremity

21072.desc: You restored the power of Summoning on Bectas by fighting the sealed god. Will that happen again if you fight the mystical wolf?
21072.name: Howling Wolf Spirit

21073.desc: The frequency of enemy attacks has changed... You have a bad feeling about this. You could be wrong, but it feels like you're being chased somewhere.
21073.name: Name the Reaper

21074.desc: It seems the Mystical Wolf's minions have surrounded the area, but you can't let yourself lose for Luciana and Liana's sakes!
21074.name: Defiled Soul

21080.desc: Rene calls you deep underground, beneath the lake castle. Once inside, you experience a sense of deja vu recalling Bariura in Grand Gaia.
21080.name: Ancient Relics

21090.desc: You see something unexpected as you progress deep into the polar region. It's shocking to see a place so verdant in this snowbound world.
21090.name: A Flourishing Place

22000.desc: The sun is warm, and the winds are gentle. The climate near here seems nice. Even the leaves make a pleasant sound.
22000.name: Gentle Winds

22001.desc: You see a band of people in black chasing a woman. You don't understand the situation, but she's clearly in danger!
22001.name: Daylight Shadows

22002.desc: Who were those people in black? They might attack again, so you need to get somewhere with better visibility.
22002.name: Bamboo Cacophony

22010.desc: You've heard of warriors called shinobi. Does that mean someone from Ohbanahara became a Grand Gaian hero?
22010.name: Darkness Amid Light

22011.desc: Seria's decision caught you off guard. She must be growing up. You can't let her show you up, though.
22011.name: Tranquil Winds

22012.desc: You're going to help Suzune reclaim the country, but that will probably take more than civil discussions to achieve. Be ready to fight.
22012.name: A Rich Nation

22013.desc: The watery fields around you are apparently called paddies, and they're strangely beautiful when they glisten in the sunlight.
22013.name: Glistening Fields

22020.desc: You've seen many signs of wartime destruction already, but this is the first time you've seen the site of a battle that was only days old...
22020.name: Winds of Corruption

22021.desc: Broken swords, shattered armor... You should probably stop looking so closely at the things around you. Suzune's looking pale, too.
22021.name: Ghastly Scars

22022.desc: Sakunoshin said that people who dress and cover their faces like the one you just passed are called begging monks. They dress very suspiciously.
22022.name: Prayer and Repose

22023.desc: Apparently there's a checkpoint and a city once you get past Calamity Plains. Maybe you should dress like you're from this world to get through it?
22023.name: Whispers of Death

22030.desc: Sakunoshin is unconscious, but you can't leave him behind. For now, try to focus your attacks on the enemy leader and make an opening!
22030.name: Pent-up Winds

22031.desc: You got free thanks to the begging monk. If he's helping you, he's probably an ally of Suzune's. Trust him for now and focus on escaping.
22031.name: Roadblock Checkpoint

22032.desc: You doubt that the enemy will risk harming Suzune, but you're not sure. You have to escape this castle as soon as possible!
22032.name: Mighty Swarms

22040.desc: There's a river down the hill and past the checkpoint. The large bridge over it that seems to lead to a city, and the castle lies just beyond.
22040.name: Winds Over Water

22041.desc: You're fascinated by this culture so unlike that of Elgaia, but you need to hurry to Suzune's rescue. You'll have time for sightseeing later.
22041.name: River Crossing

22042.desc: Genba's minions are in position on the bridge, and it won't be easy to get across. You need to hurry and push through it.
22042.name: Established Borders

22043.desc: You come to a sudden stop when you sense a powerful foe. You may have been too hasty in this. You need to calm down and stay centered as you fight.
22043.name: Breach Interruption

22044.desc: As expected, you've run into a skilled warrior. But why does this warrior know about the sealed god? You'll have to fight to find out.
22044.name: Dazzling Flames

22050.desc: There are too many enemies to count! They did know you were coming, so it's not shocking. All you can do is fight your way through.
22050.name: Winds in Darkness

22051.desc: You dash through the chaotic melee, crushing autumn leaves as you go. Get into the castle while the begging monk keeps Kagenui busy!
22051.name: Over the Wall

22052.desc: You've finally gotten through the maze-like castle walls to the main building. Now you can charge the entrance that Sakunoshin mentioned.
22052.name: Whispering Fortress

22060.desc: You're surprised that the floors are soft. It seems like all of the flooring is made of woven leaves. You notice that Sakunoshin is going barefoot.
22060.name: Stagnant Winds

22061.desc: The castle doesn't seem to be that big inside. That makes it easy to explore, but the low ceilings make it hard to swing heavy weapons.
22061.name: Palace of Bloodshed

22062.desc: You rush up the steps for a higher floor. The creaking of the stairways informs you that the castle is made of wood.
22062.name: Pillar of the Nation

22063.desc: Kagenui has caught up to you from behind, and Genba, the enemy leader, is right ahead. But if you make it through this fight, Suzune will be safe.
22063.name: Thundering Roar

22070.desc: Sakunoshin saved your life. That Phoenix Strike is terrifying, but it won't be so easy to use with Sakunoshin around.
22070.name: Wild Winds

22071.desc: You proceed over a roof made of bizarre tiles. You're so high up you couldn't help but look down. There's no coming back if you fall.
22071.name: Wrathful Skies

22072.desc: You've made it far enough to see Raka, but you face more foes than ever. Seria's eyes tell you that she'll handle it, so you keep heading up.
22072.name: Showers of Blades

22073.desc: You don't have time to wait on Seria, so you'll be facing Raka alone. It seems she won't use her Phoenix Strike, but she's too strong to take lightly.
22073.name: Unnatural Might

22074.desc: This should be your last fight in the castle. You can sense more power from the Mystical Phoenix than any other sealed god so far. Give it your all!
22074.name: Chaos in Heaven

22080.desc: Suzune has asked you to investigate a monster with Kagenui. Sakunoshin also came along for some reason. Will that cause problems?
22080.name: Mysterious Temple

22090.desc: Myoukei gave you a letter. When you had Sakunoshin read it, it said to come to this field. What does this have to do with you?
22090.name: Relentless Training

23000.desc: The Abel Faction got here ahead of you, but supposedly you're among the first humans ever to set foot here. No one knows what to expect.
23000.name: An Unexplored Land

23001.desc: It seems you're on a vast, flat grassland, but there are stones scattered across the plains. You'll trip if you don't watch your step.
23001.name: Watch Your Step

23002.desc: Despite the excellent visibility, the footing is poor. It's not a great place to fight, but at least the climate is better than some you've endured.
23002.name: Grassland Trek

23003.desc: A gentle breeze stirs the grass at your feet. The birds in the sky seem like they're enjoying it, too. Wait... Are those really birds?
23003.name: Radiant Wings

23004.desc: There's more rubble at your feet now, and you can see a building somewhere far off. Dangerous enemies are often found lurking in areas like this...
23004.name: On the High Plains

23010.desc: You hide from the magical puppets amid the shadows of the ruins. You don't know what the puppets were made for, but they seem to be combat-ready.
23010.name: Among Shadows

23011.desc: The ruins nearby are obviously too large to have been for human use. But why are they half-destroyed? Was there a battle here?
23011.name: Crumbling Masonry

23012.desc: The temperature is still nice, but it's very dark inside the massive ruins. It feels even darker given the light outside, and your eyes won't adapt.
23012.name: Eternal Darkness

23013.desc: You've been discovered by the magical puppets. Judging by their response, they don't mean to let you get away. It looks like you'll have to fight.
23013.name: Raging Shadows

23020.desc: You managed to escape from the puppets and arrived at a flooded sector. This section of the ruins looks even more degraded than the others.
23020.name: Flooded Ruins

23021.desc: Once you get through the building with water up to your waist, you find yourself walking on muddy ground. You don't want to spend very long here.
23021.name: Rubble and Mud

23022.desc: The ruins are a jumble, and there are several paths through them. Maybe one of them was easy to use once. You just want dry ground to walk on.
23022.name: Vital Wetlands

23023.desc: You agreed to work with the Abel Faction in order to defeat the magical puppets. The plan is to form three teams of two and surround the puppets.
23023.name: Common Front

23030.desc: Just as Reda said, the way past here seems rather difficult. Still, the magical puppets will catch you if you stop to complain.
23030.name: Before the Waterfall

23031.desc: You attempt the challenging climb carefully. You don't sense anyone ahead of you. Did those two from the Abel Faction find another route?
23031.name: Eroding Continent

23032.desc: You stretch out to grab a stone, then search for footing amid the waterfall's spray. It's slippery, and you watch each other as you climb.
23032.name: High, Long, and Loud

23033.desc: Your almost-submerged waterfall climb is finally at an end. It's a major accomplishment, but you feel like there had to have been an easier route.
23033.name: Reach Out

23040.desc: You reunite with Grahdens and advance along a sheer cliffside route. It's still extremely dangerous, but much easier than the waterfall climb.
23040.name: Cliffs of Courage

23041.desc: You advance carefully along the narrowing red cliff route. Reda sometimes takes stone samples from the cliff walls; maybe they're unique to Rokkzalm?
23041.name: Pure Guts

23042.desc: As you face off against the Abel Faction, more enchanted puppets suddenly enter the fray. You'll have to handle them if you're going after Rahnas!
23042.name: Wall of Attackers

23050.desc: You're concerned about Bertz and Lugina, but you have to get back to the Sealed God mission. The cavernous temple before you is utterly silent.
23050.name: Toward the Goal

23051.desc: Supposedly this world itself is a Sealed God, and apparently this temple is its center. You approach with caution as you seek the Sealed God's heart.
23051.name: Scaling the Peak

23052.desc: Since they're ahead of you, the Abel Faction has probably already reached this temple. Be careful, attacks could come from any direction.
23052.name: Head Hung Low

23053.desc: This temple is clearly split into bright and dark locations, and it seems this was deliberate. Who, or what, could've built this place?
23053.name: Discerning Eyes

23060.desc: You felt someone watching you as you stepped into the temple's heart. Is this world itself watching you?
23060.name: Tremor's Epicenter

23061.desc: The atmosphere is solemn, and you can feel tension building with each step you take. It's definitely connected to whatever lies ahead.
23061.name: Mysterious Vortex

23062.desc: Mel and Garrett are attempting to hold you back, and combat seems unavoidable. You have to eliminate them both and catch up with Rahnas right away!
23062.name: Heart of Anguish

23063.desc: You lost a lot of time fighting Mel and Garrett and now you have to hurry. Rahnas may have already reached the Sealed God's core.
23063.name: Ritual's Key

23064.desc: It won't be easy to face Rahnas unless you can fully defeat the enchanted puppet. It's a powerful foe, but you can beat anything if you try!
23064.name: The Land's Center

23070.desc: You were investigating a Sealed God signal with Grahdens when magical puppets emerged from the ground. You've got to break their encirclement!
23070.name: Awakening Puppets

100000.desc: The sacred grounds from which all living beings originate. Soak up some of the overflowing Karma.
100000.name: Sacred Land of the Souls Lv. 1

100001.desc: Further within the sacred grounds from which all living beings originate. Soak up even more of the overflowing Karma.
100001.name: Sacred Land of the Souls Lv. 2

100002.desc: A hidden domain in the sanctuary that watches over all living things. Now's your chance to get more Karma than you could ever imagine!
100002.name: Sacred Land of the Souls Lv. 3

100050.desc: It is said this is where souls come to be forged. Here is your chance to gain experience as a Summoner as well as some Karma.
100050.name: Soul Sanctuary Lv. 1

100051.desc: You are deep within the area where it's said souls come to be forged. Now's your chance to obtain lots of experience as a Summoner as well as Karma.
100051.name: Soul Sanctuary Lv. 2

100052.desc: You're at the far end of the area where it's said souls come to be forged. Now's your chance to obtain heaps of experience as a Summoner and Karma.
100052.name: Soul Sanctuary Lv. 3

100100.desc: Once a week, Nymphs, Spirits and Idols get together. Use this chance to get some Evolution Material Units!
100100.name: Garden of Nymphs

100101.desc: Once a week, Nymphs, Spirits and Idols get together. Use this chance to get some rare Evolution Material Units!
100101.name: Garden of Spirits

100102.desc: Once a week, Nymphs, Spirits and Idols get together. Use this chance to get some super rare Evolution Material Units!
100102.name: Garden of Idols

100103.desc: It is said that those with good taste hold lavish parties to display their favorite pots. It is rumored that these pots are also very rare evolution materials...
100103.name: Phantom Pots

100200.desc: A dangerous cave full of traps to ensnare those who dare enter. Despite its dangers, many still venture after its treasures.
100200.name: The Box of Desires Lv. 1

100201.desc: Further into the dangerous, trap-filled cave. Mountains of treasure or oceans of despair, who knows what awaits!
100201.name: The Box of Desires Lv. 2

100202.desc: There are many secrets in this trap-filled cave. Do you fear getting trapped in despair, or are you hopeful to find riches!?
100202.name: The Box of Desires Lv. 3

100300.desc: The Temple of Fire, said to be the birthplace of an incredible power. Novices would be wise not to enter.
100300.name: Ruins of Fire Lv. 3

100301.desc: The Temple of Water, said to be the birthplace of an incredible power. Novices would be wise not to enter.
100301.name: Ruins of Water Lv. 3

100302.desc: The Temple of Earth, said to be the birthplace of an incredible power. Novices would be wise not to enter.
100302.name: Ruins of Earth Lv. 3

100303.desc: The Temple of Thunder, said to be the birthplace of an incredible power. Novices would be wise not to enter.
100303.name: Ruins of Thunder Lv. 3

100304.desc: This temple is devoted to a god who's said to have the power to draw out one's ultimate power. The power to defeat gods awaits you deep within.
100304.name: Ruins of Miracles Lv. 4

100310.desc: The Temple of Light, said to be the birthplace of an incredible power. Novices would be wise not to enter.
100310.name: Ruins of Light

100311.desc: The Temple of Dark, said to be the birthplace of an incredible power. Novices would be wise not to enter.
100311.name: Ruins of Dark

100320.desc: A Fire pantheon where the key to surpassing the power of the gods is said to slumber. The key to unleashing calamity sleeps with this great force.
100320.name: Sanctum of Fire Lv. 6

100321.desc: A Water pantheon where the key to surpassing the power of the gods is said to slumber. The key to unleashing calamity sleeps with this great force.
100321.name: Sanctum of Water Lv. 6

100322.desc: An Earth pantheon where the key to surpassing the power of the gods is said to slumber. The key to unleashing calamity sleeps with this great force.
100322.name: Sanctum of Earth Lv. 6

100323.desc: A Thunder pantheon where the key to surpassing the power of the gods is said to slumber. The key to unleashing calamity sleeps with this great force.
100323.name: Sanctum of Thunder Lv. 6

100324.desc: A Light pantheon where the key to surpassing the power of the gods is said to slumber. The key to unleashing calamity sleeps with this great force.
100324.name: Sanctum of Light Lv. 6

100325.desc: A Dark pantheon where the key to surpassing the power of the gods is said to slumber. The key to unleashing calamity sleeps with this great force.
100325.name: Sanctum of Dark Lv. 6

100400.desc: Heroes and spirits from all over gather among these dangerous ruins. Now's your chance to gather hordes of Material Units!
100400.name: The Wandering Spirit Lv. 1

100401.desc: Deeper within the dangerous ruins, home to heroes and spirits from all over. Now's your chance to get some valuable Material Units!
100401.name: The Wandering Spirit Lv. 2

100402.desc: The deepest reaches of the dangerous ruins, home to heroes and spirits from all over. Now's your chance to obtain some rare Material Units!
100402.name: The Wandering Spirit Lv. 3

100403.desc: This hidden area is home to dangerous relics from heroes and warriors all over. Now's your chance to get these otherwise hard to get materials!
100403.name: The Wandering Spirit Lv. 4

100500.desc: This dungeon of dreams is said to be inhabited by monsters made of Zel, the currency of this world..
100500.name: Gold Valley Lv. 1

100501.desc: This dungeon of dreams is said to be inhabited by monsters packed full of Zel, the currency of this world.
100501.name: Gold Valley Lv. 2

100502.desc: This dungeon of dreams is said to be inhabited by monsters bursting full of Zel, the currency of this world.
100502.name: Gold Valley Lv. 3

100600.desc: Take part in this grand parade and capture some of these metal type monsters, bursting full of fusion experience!!
100600.name: Metal Parade!

100601.desc: A grand procession featuring only Metal Units that are Super Rare and above! Metal Kings and above guaranteed, don't miss this great chance!
100601.name: Super Metal Parade!

100608.desc: A grand procession featuring Fire Metal monsters with loads of Fire experience is coming your way! Don't miss out!
100608.name: Fire Metal Parade

100609.desc: A grand procession featuring Water Metal monsters with loads of Water experience is coming your way! Don't miss out!
100609.name: Water Metal Parade

100610.desc: A grand procession featuring Earth Metal monsters with loads of Earth experience is coming your way! Don't miss out!
100610.name: Earth Metal Parade

100611.desc: A grand procession featuring Thunder Metal monsters with loads of Thunder experience is coming your way! Don't miss out!
100611.name: Thunder Metal Parade

100612.desc: A grand procession featuring Light Metal monsters with loads of Light experience is coming your way! Don't miss out!
100612.name: Light Metal Parade

100613.desc: A grand procession featuring Dark Metal monsters with loads of Dark experience is coming your way! Don't miss out!
100613.name: Dark Metal Parade

100650.desc: A big parade of Jewel monsters full of Zel is coming your way! The hunt for riches is on!
100650.name: Jewel Parade!

100651.desc: Here comes a mystical parade full of high class jewel monsters. Now's your chance to get super rich with Kings and higher guaranteed!
100651.name: Super Jewel Parade

100660.desc: Strange creatures called Elgifs have been found in the Vortex. The curious glyphs written on their otherworldly tablets hide great powers within.
100660.name: Guardians of Lore Lv. 3

100661.desc: Elgifs are very rare creatures who seldom show themselves to humans. So if you spot one, it is a good omen of the things to come.
100661.name: Guardians of Lore Lv. 5

100662.desc: Only those blessed with luck can obtain the rarest of the tablets. However, the gods alone seem to know where the mysterious Elgifs dwell.
100662.name: Guardians of Lore Lv. 7

100663.desc: You who seek the luminous tablets, open the door if you have prepared your heart and mind. A trial unlike any you have faced before awaits.
100663.name: Forbidden Tablets Lv. 5

100664.desc: These valuable tablets with their unusual powers are not easily obtained. Only those with immense power and rare luck are granted a chance at them.
100664.name: Forbidden Tablets Lv. 7

100665.desc: Only those who are prepared to die may proceed. Unfathomable despair and the ultimate power granted only to the chosen one await you.
100665.name: Forbidden Tablets Lv. 10

100700.desc: A traveler on the first steps of her journey. Her inexperience clouds her ability to see the value in friendship.
100700.name: The Lone Traveller Lv. 1

100701.desc: A traveler who has come to be known throughout the land. She's realized the value of having someone to train with.
100701.name: The Lone Traveller Lv. 2

100702.desc: A valiant traveler who commands praise wherever she goes. She continues her journey, always on the look out for worthy allies.
100702.name: The Lone Traveller Lv. 3

100800.desc: Living among the shadows, his pride as a ninja warrants him little contact with others. Few are harder to pin down than he.
100800.name: Dweller in the Darkness Lv. 1

100801.desc: Acting under the cover of night, there's no objective he can't achieve. Who knows what it'd take to capture such a man.
100801.name: Dweller in the Darkness Lv. 2

100802.desc: Enveloped in a burning red darkness, only the strongest could even stir this man, whose training has cleansed him of all desire.
100802.name: Dweller in the Darkness Lv. 3

100900.area: Bearer of the Flaming God Arm
100900.desc: Rebelling against his heritage as a blacksmith in his younger days, it'd take a lot more than strong wits to gain this man's allegiance.
100900.dungeon: Bearer of the Flaming God Arm
100900.name: Bearer of the God Arm Lv. 1

100901.area: Bearer of the Flaming God Arm
100901.desc: Creating his own path as a blacksmith, he has come to acknowledge the raw strength that others possess.
100901.dungeon: Bearer of the Flaming God Arm
100901.name: Bearer of the God Arm Lv. 2

100902.area: Bearer of the Flaming God Arm
100902.desc: He soon came to be known as the God Arm, though this power he only showed to those he deemed worthy.
100902.dungeon: Bearer of the Flaming God Arm
100902.name: Bearer of the God Arm Lv. 3

101000.desc: A pirate as brutal as she is beautiful. Many have tried, and failed, to thaw her impenetrable icy heart...
101000.name: Flower in the Frost Lv. 1

101001.desc: Her ferocity and coldness of character are notorious throughout the seas. Rumor has it that even the Sea King was unable to dent her frosty exterior.
101001.name: Flower in the Frost Lv. 2

101002.desc: Her attacks and insults freeze the hearts of both enemies and allies alike. Captain of a huge fleet of pirate ships, she has no time for any but the strongest of individuals.
101002.name: Flower in the Frost Lv. 3

101100.desc: A boxer who set out on an epic journey to discover her origins. Her fists make mincemeat out of any who dare to approach her.
101100.name: The Iron-Fisted Lady Lv. 1

101101.desc: She has sworn to continue traveling until she finds the answers she’s looking for. A world of hurt awaits any who stand in her way.
101101.name: The Iron-Fisted Lady Lv. 2

101102.desc: None exist who haven’t heard of this true brawling legend. She respects only those who understand the true meaning of destruction.
101102.name: The Iron-Fisted Lady Lv. 3

101200.desc: A fighter who seeks great power to protect the one he loves. He pays attention only to those who exude the kind of power he desires.
101200.name: When Lightning Strikes Lv. 1

101201.desc: A fighter who travels the world in search of the one he loves. The encounters and experiences he absorbs along the way add to his burgeoning strength.
101201.name: When Lightning Strikes Lv. 2

101202.desc: A fighter with a kick powerful enough to crush even gods. Known as "Thunder Kick," he only has time for those who he thinks demonstrate enough power themselves.
101202.name: When Lightning Strikes Lv. 3

101700.desc: The Six Sibyl Sisters were said to have rescued many people. Here lays a shrine dedicated to one of them. Why was it they reached out to save the people?
101700.name: Affectionate Flames Lv. 3

101701.desc: The Blaze Sibyl saved the people with an affectionate heart of mercy. However, that in turn led to her fighting her sisters. The sadness from that fight still lingers.
101701.name: Affectionate Flames Lv. 4

101800.desc: The ice cold air pricks at your skin, but what awaits ahead is a sibyl said to have a glacial glare even colder than ice.
101800.name: Absolute Zero Lv. 3

101801.desc: A blade of ice that shines clear and bright thanks to the blood of the people it has fed on. Perhaps this is a symbol of her true pure nature.
101801.name: Absolute Zero Lv. 4

101900.desc: The land that was once covered with beautiful blossoming flowers now exists as a dark, cold place, just like the memories of the young Rose Sibyl.
101900.name: Gaia's Voice Lv. 3

101901.desc: The young Rose Sibyl was best known for her sweet childlike smile. But do not underestimate her, for pure innocence and pure ruthlessness are two sides of the same coin.
101901.name: Gaia's Voice Lv. 4

102000.desc: The sisters once chatted joyfully in the land of thunder. Now, not a trace of their happiness can be found.
102000.name: In the Name of Thunder Lv. 3

102001.desc: Do these bolts of lightning represent the rage of a sibyl of destruction, or are they her tears, shed over the battle with her sisters? The truth will never be known.
102001.name: In the Name of Thunder Lv. 4

102100.desc: This sparkling shrine was once the pride of the Six Sisters. Now, without a master, rampant monsters lurk in alongside the souls of the sibyls of destruction.
102100.name: Protected by the Sky Lv. 3

102101.desc: The sibyl who had the kindness and mercy to forgive all sins, yet she couldn't save those closest to her. What might she reveal to a Summoner able to capture her?
102101.name: Protected by the Sky Lv. 4

102200.desc: The shrine sparkles like a star scattered sky. Just like the night sky it is breathtaking yet terrifying, awakening one's primal fear of the dark.
102200.name: Enthralled by the Moon Lv. 3

102201.desc: She was too engrossed in pursuing her ideals which is why she couldn't forgive anything. Regardless the passage of time, this never changed.
102201.name: Enthralled by the Moon Lv. 4

102800.desc: Entry to the Mysterious Paradise is only granted once a day. Croaking voices can be heard echoing in the distance.
102800.name: Mysterious Paradise

102810.desc: Entry to the Ultimate Paradise is only granted once a day. Not only are there croaking voices, something can be seen sparkling from inside.
102810.name: Ultimate Paradise

102920.desc: Imps which can improve the abilities of those they are fused with. Don't miss your chance to travel to the land where these little ones gather!
102920.name: Garden of Imps

103000.desc: A knight who once led a refugee escape from Grand Gaia to Elgaia. What could he be thinking now that he has shown himself once again?
103000.name: Guiding Knight Lv. 5

103001.desc: The sword that once protected people during the war with the gods is now pointed in your direction. And with it, stern eyes that seem to test you.
103001.name: Guiding Knight Lv. 6

103100.desc: A martial artist from the Toltya Dojo that protected those headed to Elgaia. Having regained his many secret techniques, now he stands in your way.
103100.name: Martial Artist Lv. 5

103101.desc: The secret techniques of the Toltya Dojo defeated countless gods during the great escape. This master's eyes look towards the future, ready to battle.
103101.name: Martial Artist Lv. 6

103200.desc: The youngster who planned the escape from Grand Gaia to Elgaia. Once she makes use of her brilliant intellect once again, how will it affect this era?
103200.name: Friend Power Lv. 5

103201.desc: The eyes of the youngster who used her intellect to help her dear friends now stare at you silently. A strong will lies deep within them.
103201.name: Friend Power Lv. 6

103300.desc: A young magician who guided the people after receiving a divine revelation from the gods. Could the will of the gods have brought her back as well?
103300.name: Holy Revelation Lv. 5

103301.desc: The childhood friends that once fought by her side are no longer present. And yet she looks forward, believing in the dawn of a new era.
103301.name: Holy Revelation Lv. 6

103400.desc: A heavily armored knight who saved many people during the escape to Elgaia. The white armor that once protected many now obstructs your path.
103400.name: Light the Way Lv. 5

103401.desc: A strong soul that aided those who led the escape to Elgaia. One to look towards the future, his past remains a mystery. What path will he show you?
103401.name: Light the Way Lv. 6

103500.desc: A knight from the Bariura Empire who defied the emperor and led his people to Elgaia. Bearing great pride, his soul has descended to Elgaia once more.
103500.name: Twilight Pride Lv. 5

103501.desc: Though you seek peace for Grand Gaia, the ire he once held during the duel with his knight companion over their plan of escape is now directed at you!
103501.name: Twilight Pride Lv. 6

103600.desc: A curious stage has been found deep within ancient ruins. And with it, a young songstress singing atop it. What could her message to the Summoners be?
103600.name: Shining Stage Lv. 1

103601.desc: A diva found on the odd stage in the ruins. Her angelic voice continues to charm all Summoners. However, a certain one among them would change her...
103601.name: Shining Stage Lv. 2

103602.desc: A diva found on the odd stage in the ruins. With a voice that once charmed the gods themselves, its sound makes humans forget the passage of time.
103602.name: Shining Stage Lv. 3

106500.desc: An Elgaian martial artist who served during the foundation of Akras Summoners' Hall. Even in death, his soul seeks worthy opponents to battle.
106500.name: Seeker of Flame Lv. 6

106501.desc: The martial artist only ever truly felt alive during a battle. He still longs to feel the thrill of a duel with another demon.
106501.name: Seeker of Flame Lv. 7

106600.desc: Long ago, the Elgaia Federation formed a secret Ishgria Expeditionary Force with convicts. What sort of officer could lead this unlikely team?
106600.name: Ice Blade's Wisdom Lv. 6

106601.desc: Betrayed by the Federation and abandoned in a demon-ravaged land, the souls of the Ishgria Expeditionary Force wander even now...
106601.name: Ice Blade's Wisdom Lv. 7

106700.desc: A brilliant Federation researcher obsessed with otherworldly technology. Could it be the master's own mad spirit that inhabits his precious automaton?
106700.name: Heretic Researcher Lv. 6

106701.desc: It's said that his beloved automaton was further augmented to battle against demons. Its crazed spirit still seeks new targets to destroy.
106701.name: Heretic Researcher Lv. 7

106800.desc: A tribe of tenacious hunters once lived on Elgaia's frontier. When tragedy struck, only one lived on to avenge their catastrophic downfall.
106800.name: Tumultuous Hunter Lv. 6

106801.desc: After taking revenge, the lone hunter wanted no more than to return to his people's traditions of living and dying by the hunt of powerful fiends.
106801.name: Tumultuous Hunter Lv. 7

106900.desc: This Elgaian priestess was a devout believer of the Sealed God Lucius. In her mind, justice was found only in the teachings of her infallible god.
106900.name: Sealed God's Apostle Lv. 6

106901.desc: Betrayed, only one purpose remained to her: "Destroy the enemies of our god." Even in death, could her spirit ever find peace?
106901.name: Sealed God's Apostle Lv. 7

107000.desc: A spy from the Randall Empire had infiltrated the Elgaia Federation. He fought alone to discover the truth behind the Ishgria Expedition.
107000.name: Deceiving Blade Lv. 6

107001.desc: With no way to return home, he continued his investigation. Even now, his soul seeks a path home, to give his final report.
107001.name: Deceiving Blade Lv. 7

107600.desc: You can see the great Royal Capital before you after crossing the gate. As you approach it with care, a huge arena catches your eye.
107600.name: Burning Soul Lv. 1

107601.desc: A blonde young man awaits in the otherworldly arena of the Royal Capital smiling fearlessly as he unsheathes his blade. Challenges seem to please him.
107601.name: Burning Soul Lv. 2

107602.desc: The many marks around the arena suggest men and beasts have fought here before. How many battles to the death has this place seen on a regular basis?
107602.name: Burning Soul Lv. 3

107650.desc: You see a great arena before you past the gate to another world. A young man with flowing long black hair awaits with sword in hand.
107650.name: Tranquil Spirit Lv. 1

107651.desc: Amidst all the commotion in this new world, you meet a young man with black hair that excels in swordsmanship. There is nowhere to run now.
107651.name: Tranquil Spirit Lv. 2

107652.desc: The deep claw marks and gashes left upon the structure of the arena are a testament of the vicious battles that continuously take place here.
107652.name: Tranquil Spirit Lv. 3

107700.desc: Swallowed by the vortex, the Summoner lands in a wasteland world. A Suddenly, a swarm of outlaws begin surrounding the area...
107700.name: Flame of Virtue Lv.1

107701.desc: One man stands among the swarm exuding an air of wildness, and roaring loudly. "The 300,000 World Dollars on your head...they're mine."
107701.name: Flame of Virtue Lv.2

107702.desc: Tsch, looks like I've been played he said, as if he'd been fooled by someone. "Don't worry, I'll pay every hit of yours back with some of my own."
107702.name: Flame of Virtue Lv.3

107800.desc: Beyond the Vortex lay a luxurious court. Knights rush forward to kill the Summoner, as the punishment is death for those who dare attempt regicide.
107800.name: Reason for the Thunderstorm Lv.1

107801.desc: The young king appears with a sword covered in lightning. He says "It is the sword that asks what lies within a warrior's breast," and a fight erupts.
107801.name: Reason for the Thunderstorm Lv.2

107802.desc: There are things that can only be told through a duel to the death. One's position, one's feelings. And thus, their swords clashed in "danger time."
107802.name: Reason for the Thunderstorm Lv.3

107900.desc: A celebration full of heroes from all over the world that's just begun! As they talk amongst themselves, could they be sending us a message too...?
107900.name: Gathering of World Heroes

107901.desc: A celebration full of heroes from all over the world that's just begun! As they talk amongst themselves, could they be sending us a message too...?
107901.name: Gathering of World Heroes

150000.desc: Fire Hero Vargas vol. 1 - Vargas, in his younger days. It wasn't long before the proud title he built for himself crumbled before him.
150000.name: Young Flames

150001.desc: Fire Hero Vargas vol. 2 - The days he ventured in search of strength. His countless fierce battles gave birth to the "Hero of the Fierce Flame."
150001.name: Trial by Fire

150002.desc: Fire Hero Vargas vol. 3 - The violent battle with the gods. Fighting alongside his comrades as well as rivals, this is where the fire hero's legend began.
150002.name: Supreme God of Fire

150010.desc: Ice Hero Selena vol. 1 - Continuing to reject taking on the responsibility of head of the Savat people, she ventures out to slay monsters.
150010.name: Modest Swordswoman

150011.desc: Ice Hero Selena vol. 2 - Upon inheriting the treasured sword Lexida as proof of her leadership, Selena ventures to many lands under her new title.
150011.name: Inherited Purpose

150012.desc: Ice Hero Selena vol. 3 - As the gods begin their attack, the people unite as one, and the legend of the Ice Goddess begins.
150012.name: Goddess of Ice

150020.desc: Earth Hero Lance vol. 1 - Lance and his demon pike. Continuing his fateful journey, many a powerful foe appeared before him.
150020.name: The Demon Pike's Seed

150021.desc: Earth Hero Lance vol. 2 - Led by his demon pike, Lance headed for the World Tree. However, something was waiting for him there.
150021.name: Revival of the World Tree

150022.desc: Earth Hero Lance vol. 3 - The gods' invasion had at last begun. Inspired by the demon pike, this is where the earth hero's legend began.
150022.name: The Forest's Sublimation

150030.desc: Thunder Hero Eze vol. 1 - Eze, in his younger days as a demon bounty hunter. Experience the fateful meeting that changed his life forever.
150030.name: The Lone Bounty Hunter

150031.desc: Thunder Hero Eze vol. 2 - Aware of his own weaknesses, he immerses himself in training. That is when he finds his partner for life.
150031.name: In Shining Shadows

150032.desc: Thunder Hero Eze vol. 3 - In the violent battle with the gods, he almost loses what matters to him most. Watch, as he unlocks his true power!
150032.name: The Unrivaled Fool

150040.desc: Light Hero Atro vol. 1 - After driving a bandit away with a tree branch, Atro's hidden talent leads him to begin training in La Veda fencing.
150040.name: Hidden Talent

150041.desc: Light Hero Atro vol. 2 - After acquiring the legendary sword of light, Urias, Atro becomes a master swordsman. However, many people begin appearing...
150041.name: A Swordsman's Anguish

150042.desc: Light Hero Atro vol. 3 - The invasion of the gods has begun. Though in pain, Atro fights against the God Army for the people and is struck by tragedy.
150042.name: The Will of Urias

150050.desc: Dark Hero Magress vol. 1 - Magress, a knight of the Bariura Empire trains arduously every day in hopes of meeting the emperor's expectations.
150050.name: An Empire & a Knight

150051.desc: Dark Hero Magress vol. 2 - After his family's murder, an angry Magress spends his days in battle fueling the fire of vengeance within.
150051.name: A Wish of Vengeance

150052.desc: Dark Hero Magress vol. 3 - Eliminating all enemies from his path the ever angry and resentful Magress has finally attained the power of the gods!
150052.name: The God Eater

150100.desc: 4 Heroes of Palmyna vol. 1 - After receiving a revelation, Edea sets off on a journey to search for allies to help repel the gods' attack on Palmyna.
150100.name: The Search for Allies

150101.desc: 4 Heroes of Palmyna vol. 2 - The warriors head towards their decisive battle against Cardes! They must save Palmyna from the gods' invasion!
150101.name: 4 Heroes of Palmyna

150102.desc: 4 Heroes of Palmyna vol. 3 - The price paid to seal Cardes was a great one. All the heroes come to gather around a dormant Edea.
150102.name: A New Hope

150200.desc: Sefia - Foes manifesting from another world are invading Elgaia. She will exert divine justice upon them with her eight sacred blades!
150200.name: Exorcist Blade

150201.desc: Kikuri - A young woman from another world. She means to redecorate the new stage of Grand Gaia by dying it crimson as she dances!
150201.name: Scarlet Stage

150202.desc: Sefia & Kikuri - Red flowers are bound to bloom on the battlefield when these two opposing forces work together!
150202.name: Blades and Blossoms

150300.desc: Ten-Winged Tormentor vol. 1 - A white presence suddenly appears, destroying all in its path. Elsewhere, a suspicious dark presence awakens as well.
150300.name: Disciple of Ruin

150301.desc: Ten-Winged Tormentor vol. 2 - Michele and Crabby set off on a journey to face the Ten Winged Destroyer, making some strange friends along the way.
150301.name: Five Color Light

150302.desc: Ten-Winged Tormentor vol. 3 - Michele's dear friends are defeated by Melchio's unbelievable power. That's when she...
150302.name: Outcome of Battle

150400.desc: Disastrous Beast vol. 1 - A girl born of two races never meant to be together looks for a fight alongside the enchanted doll her father left her.
150400.name: Half Human

150401.desc: Disastrous Beast vol. 2 - An angel meets a beast and confronts the will hiding deep within her heart. Her desire for freedom has been liberated.
150401.name: Wings of Freedom

150402.desc: Disastrous Beast vol. 3 - A group that fights against the gods with their own hopes in mind. They had been hidden from them before, but no longer.
150402.name: Retaliating Spirits

150500.desc: 12 Guardians of the Gods vol. 1 - Before Sodis's rebellion, Farlon takes his fellow Guardians on many different missions.
150500.name: Ferocious Fire

150501.desc: 12 Guardians of the Gods vol. 2 - Sodis's younger brother, Alyut, joins the Guardians. His talents begin to blossom with the support of his comrades.
150501.name: Path of Light

150502.desc: 12 Guardians of the Gods vol. 3 - The Guardians face off against the demon Zorbadel. They must overcome this menace by working together!
150502.name: 12 Guardians of the Gods

150503.desc: 12 Guardians of the Gods vol. 4 - A mission calls for the execution of the traitor Sodis, but each of the Guardians begins to follow their own path.
150503.name: Traitors

150504.desc: 12 Guardians of the Gods vol. 5 - Luly becomes the catalyst for the fight between Alyut's forces and Sodis's supporters.
150504.name: Chaos

150505.desc: 12 Guardians of the Gods vol. 6 - The final battle of the 12 Guardians draws near. They haven't even stopped to consider each other's feelings...
150505.name: Conflicting Beliefs

150506.desc: 12 Guardians of the Gods (Extra) - Years pass since the Guardians' last battle. The only two survivors foresee the war between mankind and the gods.
150506.name: Sliver of Pride

150601.desc: Leaders of the Escape Vol. 1 - After the defeat of the Six Heroes, all regions fall into chaos. Leaders must step up to guide the people anew.
150601.name: Struggle to Escape

150602.desc: Leaders of the Escape Vol. 2 - As the people try to flee, Reed and Eru butt heads with each other. The promised land is almost at their reach, but...
150602.name: Road to Elgaia

150700.desc: Cursed Fire Armor vol. 1 - A scientist with her creation, and a twin sword wielding knight are after the demon Vishra and his cursed existence.
150700.name: The So-Called Demon

150701.desc: Cursed Fire Armor vol. 2 - A fierce battle erupts when those after the demon Vishra finally meet their target.
150701.name: The Last Stand

150702.desc: Cursed Fire Armor vol. 3 - The fight against Vishra begins changing everyone individually, including Vishra himself...
150702.name: Defeat & the Future

150703.desc: Cursed Fire Armor (Extra) - Logan regains his senses after his friend sacrifices his life for him. However, what awaits Reeze and Lilith henceforth?
150703.name: Those Left Behind

150800.desc: Six Pillars' Rebellion vol. 1 - The great gods known as the Divine Ten once had powerful disciples who would eventually turn against them.
150800.name: Unexpected Battle

150801.desc: Six Pillars' Rebellion vol. 2 - The disciples of the Divine Ten draw their weapons against their masters. They all have their reasons for fighting.
150801.name: Surpassing the Gods

150802.desc: Six Pillars' Rebellion vol. 3 - The Six Pillars are sealed in to pay for their betrayal. The one who survives this will be granted freedom, but...
150802.name: Circling Strategy

150900.desc: The Princess & the Knight vol. 1 - Priscilla and Arus chase after a rampaging ancient dragon. However, a demon seems to lie behind it all...
150900.name: The Dragon Awakens

150901.desc: The Princess & the Knight vol. 2 - Shera and Belfura join Priscilla and Arus to confront the ancient dragon once again.
150901.name: Long Awaited Rematch

150902.desc: The Princess & the Knight vol. 3 - Priscilla and Arus land in another world. The demon who had plotted it all finally reveals his existence to them.
150902.name: Entrusted Future

151000.desc: Oracle Knight's Troop vol. 1 - The Oracle Knight lives to serve the god Lucius. Amongst the many to bear that title, one went by the name of Ark...
151000.name: The Oracle Knight

151001.desc: Oracle Knight's Troop vol. 2 - The Oracle Knight and the Oracle Maiden follow Lucius's orders and head towards the Holy Emperor with their comrades.
151001.name: To the Holy Emperor

151002.desc: Oracle Knight's Troop vol. 3 - The final battle between the Oracle Knight's Troop and Karna Masta, the god who seeks to destroy humanity, begins now!
151002.name: Confronting a God

151100.desc: After having lost his memory in battle, Avant comes across a blade of flames. What awaits him after having overcome the loss of his son?
151100.name: The Blade Burns Anew

151200.desc: The Noble Thief Zelnite's story has yet to be told... Follow our mysterious hero as he uncovers the sinister plot of the Bariura Empire!
151200.name: The Secret of Bariura

151300.desc: A Master's Wisdom vol. 1 - Mythic Kulyuk treats all living things equally. Many races have gathered around him as disciples...
151300.name: Mythic Disciples

151301.desc: A Master's Wisdom vol. 2 - Kulyuk sets out to meet the Holy Emperor, but this is just the beginning of the tragedy for him and his followers...
151301.name: Conspiracy in Motion

151302.desc: A Master's Wisdom vol. 3 - Kulyuk's disciples spring into action, each acting on their own beliefs, but an even harsher fate awaits them...
151302.name: The Resistance

151303.desc: A Master's Wisdom vol. 4 - Kulyuk vanished suddenly after being called by the Holy Emperor. What could have happened to him?
151303.name: True Equality

151400.desc: Heroes of a New Era vol. 1 - Humanity has found hope in the new land of Elgaia. However, a threat quickly approaches!
151400.name: Comrades Assemble

151401.desc: Heroes of a New Era vol. 2 - The Randall Guard has finally been formed, but its members seem rather peculiar...
151401.name: The Randall Guard

151402.desc: Heroes of a New Era vol. 3 - A demon suddenly appears in the city to test the Randall Guard. Are they truly worthy of being called heroes?
151402.name: A Trial for Heroes

151500.desc: Blue Blooded Truth vol.1 - Princess Mariela possesses special powers and predicts that otherworldly demons will come for her in an invasion...
151500.name: Prediction of Strife

151501.desc: Blue Blooded Truth vol.2 - As the head of the dragon clan's new wife, Mariela gained a child, but that gives rise to a new tragedy...
151501.name: Created Avengers

151502.desc: Blue Blooded Truth vol.3 - Desires violently collide as Lyonesse seeks to protect the child of the dragon clan's chief from Sonia and Serge.
151502.name: Dragons Versus Lions

151503.desc: Blue Blooded Truth vol.4 - Times passes, and Karl arrives in the land of Ishgria as a Summoner. There he encounters a certain dragon clan warrior...
151503.name: Blue Blooded Bond

500000.desc: A special battle simulator designed to train Summoners. Crush every enemy you encounter to increase your innermost potential!
500000.name: Experience Training Lv. 1

500001.desc: A special battle simulator designed to train Summoners. Defeat incoming enemies to see your innermost potential soar!
500001.name: Experience Training Lv. 2

500002.desc: A special battle simulator designed to train Summoners. Defeat all foes standing in your way and develop your battle strength!
500002.name: Experience Training Lv.3

500020.desc: A special battle simulator designed to hone the Summoning Arts. Defeat all foes in your way to grow more proficient!
500020.name: Summoning Arts Training Lv. 1

500021.desc: A special battle simulator designed to hone the Summoning Arts. Exterminate all foes heading towards you to hone your techniques!
500021.name: Summoning Arts Training Lv. 2

500022.desc: A battle simulator designed to hone your Summoning skills. Defeat all foes standing in your way to hone your techniques!
500022.name: Summoning Arts Training Lv.3

500040.desc: A special battle simulator designed to bolster the power of Summoner weapons. Vanquish all incoming enemies to develop your skills!
500040.name: Weapon Training Lv. 1

500041.desc: A special battle simulator designed to bolster the power of Summoner weapons. Destroy any enemies on the field to test your weapons' limits!
500041.name: Weapon Training Lv. 2

500042.desc: A battle simulator designed to bolster the power of Summoner weapons. Defeat all foes standing in your way and seize further power!
500042.name: Weapon Training Lv.3

500060.desc: A special battle simulator designed to help break parameter limits. Destroy all foes before you and allow your true talents to shine!
500060.name: Parameters Training Lv. 1

500061.desc: A special battle simulator designed to help break parameter limits. Crush all foes after you and watch yourself grow in the process!
500061.name: Parameters Training Lv. 2

500062.desc: A battle simulator designed to help break parameter limits. Defeat all foes standing in your way and go beyond your own limits!
500062.name: Parameters Training Lv.3

600000.desc: Here you will face a monster from Raid Battle. Rumor has it Noel is behind its enhanced power...
600000.name: Round No. 001

600010.desc: A fight against an Elder Summoner who has watched over you since the very beginning. It would seem he wants to test how far you have come.
600010.name: Round No. 002

600020.desc: A battle with a demon that has thrown itself into an endless whirlwind of war. Keep elements in mind as you fight or victory will elude you.
600020.name: Round No. 003

600030.desc: 絶大なる神の力を封印するために召喚された封神儀たち。真の召喚の力を使いこなし、彼らにその力を認めさせるのだ。
600030.name: 第四の戦域

700100.desc: What happens to all those Christmas trees after they've been disposed of? What do they become? What have they done with Santa?
700100.name: Santa's Workshop Lv. 1

700101.desc: It seems as though some of Santa's workers have turned on him. How could this have happened? Help Santa and restore the Christmas spirit!
700101.name: Santa's Workshop Lv. 2

700102.desc: The evil forces that have taken over Santa's Workshop have run amok. Take Santa back and save Christmas for the children of Grand Gaia.
700102.name: Santa's Workshop Lv. 3

700200.desc: People believe in a different Pantheon in the North. Such legend tells us about the 6 exceptional semi-goddesses who wield special powers. Do you dare meet them?
700200.name: Skalmold's Rise and Fall Lv. 1

700201.desc: It is said that these semi-goddesses select fallen warriors to enter their heaven to fight side by side with the gods. What will your fate be? Only a select few will find out.
700201.name: Skalmold's Rise and Fall Lv. 2

700202.desc: Skalmold has gone rogue. She has fled her role as the bringer of souls and bathes in attention from her suitors. Defeat her for a chance to unlock the secrets of the Pantheon
700202.name: Skalmold's Rise and Fall Lv. 3

700400.desc: Skalmold's demise was thought to bring stability to the pantheon. There were, however, unintended consequences. Although unknown to most, Geirdriful was Skalmold's sister.
700400.name: Geirdriful's Torment Lv. 1

700401.desc: Overwhelmed by pain, Geirdriful ate her late sister's heart, unknowing as to how much this dark ritual would affect her brain and her powers...
700401.name: Geirdriful's Torment Lv. 2

700402.desc: Geirdriful is now striding the coldest lands of Grand Gaia, slaying anyone and anything that she encounters. Would you dare confronting her?
700402.name: Geirdriful's Torment Lv. 3

700403.desc: WARNING - DO NOT ENTER. NOT FOR THE FAINT OF HEART.
700403.name: Geirdriful's Torment Lv. 4

700500.desc: The only place for a frog to be.
700500.name: Froggy Labyrinth Lv. 1

700501.desc: RoboFrog: "Some people are eating my legs! Help me!"
700501.name: Froggy Labyrinth Lv. 2

700502.desc: A unique unit is hiding here. Capture him and find out yourself! What the croak?
700502.name: Froggy Labyrinth Lv. 3

700600.desc: A different world. Another dimension. Verdute, who we know as a Mad Tyrant here, is a hero in the Mirror World. Save etudreV from sagraV!
700600.name: etudreV's Reflection Lv. 1

700601.desc: Would you dare journey through the Mirror World? The now tyrant, sagraV has enslaved his realm. Heroes whose names could be familiar to you are fighting him.
700601.name: etudreV's Reflection Lv. 2

700602.desc: In lladnaR, the tyrant sagraV captured etudreV's soul in a Mirror. If you could defeat him, etudreV would be a great asset in our own world.
700602.name: etudreV's Reflection Lv. 3

700603.desc: !!ksir nwo ruoy ta retnE !yznerF ni dlroW rorriM !gninraW
700603.name: etudreV's Reflection Lv. 4

700700.desc: We are back in the Mirror World. sagraV is now throwing all he's got... He seems to have a secret weapon to try to win this war.
700700.name: tuanregguJ's Reflection Lv. 1

700701.desc: The war is on! Gather all the heroes from both worlds to try to defeat sagraV. A great danger is upon all of our worlds!
700701.name: tuanregguJ's Reflection Lv. 2

700702.desc: You need to journey back to the mirror World, sagraV captured tuanregguJ to modify it as the death bringer Juggernaut. We need you back, chosen ones!
