700702.name: tuanregguJ's Reflection Lv. 3

700703.desc: !!ksir nwo ruoy ta retnE !yznerF ni dlroW rorriM !gninraW
700703.name: tuanregguJ's Reflection Lv. 4

700800.desc: The Portal that once led you to the northern territories and the mirror world just opened again... where will it lead us this time?
700800.name: Journey Out of Town Lv1

700801.desc: A strange world. A race of Shapeshifters use their powers to enslave all other races and call themselves the Noblesses.
700801.name: Journey Out of Town Lv2

700802.desc: A strange plot develops between the Noblesses. Men have been found beheaded. Who is the culprit?
700802.name: Journey Out of Town Lv3

700803.desc: You found the secret! Countess Jade of the Cruel Forest and The Crimson Fort has a bad habit of beheading her suitors... Maybe you could "suggest" her to stop.
700803.name: Journey Out of Town Lv4

700900.desc: Will you be able to find Wandering Jack?
700900.name: Orange Forest Lv. 1

700901.desc: You venture deeper and deeper into the forest... Menacing trees, smiling pumpkins...
700901.name: Orange Forest Lv. 2

700902.desc: A pumburkiny?! But where is Jack? Have you found any orange treats?
700902.name: Orange Forest Lv. 3

700903.desc: Jack’s back! He adopted a burny?!
700903.name: Orange Forest Lv. 4

701000.desc: Will you be able to find Wandering Jack?
701000.name: Green Forest Lv. 1

701001.desc: You venture deeper and deeper into the forest... Menacing trees, smiling pumpkins...
701001.name: Green Forest Lv. 2

701002.desc: A pumburkiny?! But where is Jack? Have you found any green treats?
701002.name: Green Forest Lv. 3

701003.desc: Jack’s back! He adopted a burny?!
701003.name: Green Forest Lv. 4

701100.desc: The vortex opens in front of you. A new world, another time, a desolate future where it’s all about survival of the fittest.
701100.name: Bad Lands Lv. 1

701101.desc: This strange and anarchic future makes you restless. The area seems to be dominated by a close-knit and well-trained band of rogues, bent on looting the remaining resources.
701101.name: Bad Lands Lv. 2

701102.desc: The leader of this band seems to like you. They are soon going to launch their final raid against a city in the midst of the dunes.
701102.name: Bad Lands Lv. 3

701300.desc: The ruins of an ancient city. They seem to be haunted by strange creatures...
701300.name: Ruines of knowledge Lv1

701301.desc: After penetrating deeper into the ruins, you sense infinite knowledge is buried here within.
701301.name: Ruines of knowledge Lv2

701400.desc: Priscilla has got lost in Santa Claus’ mountains. Even worse yet, she’s lost Santa...
701400.name: Crimson Mountain Lv 1

701401.desc: Yoohoo?! Santa? They went crazy. Capture them and bring them back to the log cabin.
701401.name: Crimson Mountain Lv 2

701500.desc: Priscilla has got lost in Santa Claus’ mountains. Even worse yet! She’s lost Santa...
701500.name: Emerald Mountain Lv 1

701501.desc: Yoohoo?! Santa? They went crazy. Capture them and bring them back to the log cabin.
701501.name: Emerald Mountain Lv 2

701600.desc: The Quest for the Grail has begun. The most gallant knights have gathered before Arthur and have left for all four corners of Grand Gaïa.
701600.name: Neo Avalon Lv. 3

701601.desc: A mysterious knight seems to block the path. He says he’s waiting for Arthur, talks of destiny. A prophecy “The truth, revealed, fragmented and known to no one”.
701601.name: Neo Avalon Lv. 4

701602.desc: There are surely some parts left for you to collect before Grand Gaia is brought into the light.
701602.name: Neo Avalon Lv. 5

701700.desc: eno on ot nwonk dna detnemgarf ,delaever ,hturt ehT
701700.name: nolavA Lv. 6

701800.desc: You've arrived in Valhalla, a legendary haven for the souls of fallen warriors... The Corruption pervading Elgaia appears to emanate from here. An immense forest stand in front of you.
701800.name: The Encounter

701801.desc: The forest gets more dense around you, radiating an abnormal sense of aggression. You’re not welcome here!
701801.name: Corrupted Undergrowth

701802.desc: Penetrating into the midst of the forest, you feel a great power all around you. You know that a Valkyrie haunts these woods, but why would she try to fight you?
701802.name: Kingdom of Plants

701803.desc: You have passed the heart of the forest, it should be easier going now. But the evil pervading the woods is still present. You have a growing sense of disquiet.
701803.name: Warrior Queen of the Woods

701804.desc: Surrounded by blades of rock and wood, the way ahead is blocked by the mistress of this place. Her aura is no longer the same as when you last encountered her...
701804.name: Goddess of Nature

701900.desc: You win! After the forest, the path winds its way up towards the peak. You see only bare rock and carrion birds around you, and death and black magic loom oppressively in the air...
701900.name: Bird of Ill Omen

701901.desc: This place, once a haven for vanquished chiefs, generals and sorcerers is nothing but a den of corrupted monsters now.
701901.name: Reaper of Shadows

701902.desc: You have mounted as far as the carrion rock. Grief and insanity permeate the rocks of this place. You glimpse images of an ancient tragedy, a forbidden ritual.
701902.name: Wings of Desolation

701903.desc: Ancient memories which are not your own overwhelm you. Infinite suffering lingers here, the mistress of this place devouring her sister’s heart.
701903.name: Carrion Rock

701904.desc: More and more carrion fowl mass around you, so numerous that they prevent you from moving forward. A potent mix of power and madness assails you from all sides!
701904.name: Goddess of the Crows

702000.desc: The jagged peak drops behind, and now before you lie mountains, lit up by forks of lightning. The place looks perilous, because there is more Corruption here than you thought!
702000.name: Electric Shock

702001.desc: Thunder rumbles as you approach, but that isn’t what worries you. You sense that part of this land is under the control of the Corruption!
702001.name: Angel of the Summit

702002.desc: Thrud is here. She has always fought on the front lines, and now she’s been corrupted, it’s even more the case.
702002.name: Hammer Blow

702003.desc: The Valkyrie thunder maiden has spent her life selecting only the boldest of warriors to lead to their rest. The bravest of them all, now fallen and corrupt, stands before you.
702003.name: Thunder Hammer

702004.desc: Thunder strikes the ground all around you. The mistress of this place will not go down without a fight!
702004.name: Goddess of Thunder

702100.desc: Leaving the mountains behind, you find yourself crossing a wide riverbed. This resting place of the sailors and warriors who’ve died at sea is only a shadow of its former self.
702100.name: Trial by Water

702101.desc: You arrive in front of an immense door which bars the river. You have to cut your way through the bodies of those laid low by the Corruption.
702101.name: The Sea Wyrm

702102.desc: You enter a cavernous grotto, where the water is shallower, but you sense a hostile force coursing through the place!
702102.name: The Underwater Grotto

702103.desc: Suddenly you no longer know if you are in a cavern or at the bottom of an abyss. No time to ask questions, the corrupted creatures from the abyss are surrounding you.
702103.name: Creatures from the Abyss

702104.desc: Water, water, everywhere, and yet, you perceive the exit isn’t far off! When you finally drag yourself out of the water, four corrupted tentacles emerge from the depths behind you.
702104.name: The Trident Goddess

702200.desc: Having defeated the Valkyrie, you gaze behind you at the gigantic mountain that you crossed. The path before you leads up a snow-covered mountain, bathed in a soft light.
702200.name: Out of the Depths

702201.desc: You trudge forward, the snow slowing your progress. The Corruption is everywhere, and the surroundings deserted. Only the few creatures you find in your path seem to be able to survive here.
702201.name: A Snowy Path

702202.desc: You come to a large building, bathed in light. The Corruption has found its way here too.
702202.name: Sacred Claws

702203.desc: The temple seems completely deserted. But you soon see this isn’t the case. The Corruption no longer needs shadows to hide its presence.
702203.name: The Temple of Light

702204.desc: You pass into a large chamber. The hall is finely sculpted, and you see that here beauty and grace were once held in the same esteem as strength.
702204.name: Lost Beauty

702205.desc: This place of grace and beauty has been invaded by the Corruption. Unease overwhelms you at last, as you are assailed by a question that your mind has striven to hold back...
702205.name: The Wings of Victory

702206.desc: Alvitr, corrupted just like her sisters were, rises up before you. Then you see the sadness in her face, the same way her sisters looked.
702206.name: The Goddess of the Heavens

702300.desc: One more Valkyrie is vanquished. Your earlier victories taste like ashes in your mouth...
702300.name: Path through the Heavens

702301.desc: You no longer concentrate on what you are doing. While you automatically mow down the corrupted, your mind is elsewhere... If the Valkyries are here...if Yggdrasil is corrupted...
702301.name: The Questions Begin

702302.desc: The plumes of smoke spiralling up from the lava flow are getting thicker. You pay no attention. Your acts are necessary here, the Corruption MUST NOT invade and destroy Grand Gaia... but...
702302.name: The Path of Doubt

702303.desc: You are lost in memories, just like when you visited Geirdriful’s home.
702303.name: The Temple of Lava

702304.desc: Skalmold’s life passes before your eyes. Sacred duties, a feeling of being trapped, seduction, power, solitude, tragedy. Then, when it is at an end, you are plunged into infinite sadness.
702304.name: The Scarlet Door

702305.desc: The heat is intense. Finally you catch sight of Yggdrasil in the distance and you understand. If Yggdrasil itself is corrupted, then life itself is corrupted, and not only in the afterlife.
702305.name: The Temple Summit

702306.desc: You prepare yourself, for you will soon meet Skalmold for the last time. But what will happen to the fallen warriors once the last of the Valkyries is defeated?
702306.name: Treacherous Flames

702400.desc: You are close to the core of this world. Yggdrasil is at the heart of everything here. Its branches reach into infinity, and its roots wind endlessly. Here all worlds are connected.
702400.name: The Way to the Tree

702401.desc: The closer you get to the tree, the more its power fills the air. Here you are, at the foot of Yggdrasil, the world tree!
702401.name: At the Foot of the Tree of Life

702402.desc: The Corruption is everywhere, and is now visible to the naked eye. Every second, each pulse of Yggdrasil’s sap spreads the Corruption through every form of life.
702402.name: The Gateway to all Worlds

702403.desc: The Empty Afterlife. All life is threatened. You head towards the source of the evil and the source of life.
702403.name: Corrupted Roots

702404.desc: Corrupt creatures launch a coordinated attack. You leave your worries to one side for the moment.
702404.name: Withered Bark

702405.desc: The Corruption comes from Yggdrasil itself. Finally you know what you have to do here.
702405.name: Doubt

702406.desc: Sparing Yggdrasil would condemn all worlds to the Corruption. Bringing it and its avatar down... Would that put an end to existence itself?
702406.name: Light and Shade

702407.desc: I am become death, The Destroyer of Worlds
702407.name: Yggdrasil

702500.desc: After Yggdrasil is defeated, the doors of this temple will open. Everything seems peaceful inside. The guardians await you for one final challenge.
702500.name: The Valkyries’ challenge

702600.desc: You’ve decided to help Llewxam battle the Corruption.
702600.name: Help Llewxam Lv. 1

702601.desc: Fight the Corruption and suppress her power!
702601.name: Help Llewxam Lv. 2

702700.desc: You’ve decided to help the Corruption spread to Llewxam's portal.
702700.dungeon: Summoners vs Llewxam Weaver of F
702700.name: Help the Corruption Lv. 1

702701.desc: Fight Llewxam and collect her tears!
702701.dungeon: Summoners vs Llewxam Weaver of F
702701.name: Help the Corruption Lv. 2

702800.desc: Kyo Kusanagi, renowned for his impressive mastery of Pyrokinesis, will gladly train you and unleash your potential. But first, you'll have to show him what you're capable of!
702800.name: Kyo's Training Grounds Lv. 1

702801.desc: Rare are those who become well versed in the Kusanagi style of ancient martial arts. Your dedication is admirable, but Kyo will not make this any easier for you. Keep it up!
702801.name: Kyo's Training Grounds Lv. 2

702802.desc: The Scion of the Flame recognizes your valor. As a terrifying foe named Rugal slowly claims dominion over Grand Gaia, Kyo is confident you will be ready to stop him.
702802.name: Kyo's Training Grounds Lv. 3

702900.desc: Equally as cruel as he is powerful, Rugal Bernstein came to Grand Gaia with the darkest of intentions, meeting no resistance. Halt his plans before he sets them all in motion!
702900.name: Rugal's Operating Base Lv. 1

702901.desc: You've proven to be a worthy opponent for which Rugal will show no mercy. Do not underestimate his ease to learn your moves or you will become yet another one of his trophies!
702901.name: Rugal's Operating Base Lv. 2

702902.desc: Rugal's fury has escalated tenfold, unleashing a state he cannot hold for too long. Send this false god back to the portal whence he came before we face total annihilation!
702902.name: Rugal's Operating Base Lv. 3

703000.desc: Journal excerpt: "...closed shut behind me, I am drifting towards the unknown, powerless." Obtain the Valkyrie Spirit material in this expedition!
703000.name: First expedition

703001.desc: Journal excerpt: "...like a distant memory. Am I also lost in time? Mysterious figures rise before me. Men or Beasts, I can't decide!" Obtain the Noblesse Emblem material in this expedition!
703001.name: Second Expedition

703002.desc: Journal excerpt: "...since this new passage opened. How these knights's armors shine is still beyond me! What unknown energy could..." Obtain the Photon Bot material in this expedition!
703002.name: Third Expedition

703003.desc: Journal excerpt: "...snow everywhere..." "...this world seems safer..." "...a strange feeling... hap... happiness..."
703003.name: Special expedition

703004.desc: Journal Excerpt: “... Another new world. Nothing’s moving. Does anyone live here? What is this dust in the distance?” Obtain Damaged Techs in this expedition!
703004.name: Fourth Expedition

703005.desc: Journal excerpt: "…Where am I? This world seems hostile… This energy…" Obtain the Dragon's scale material in this expedition!
703005.name: Fifth expedition

703100.desc: Join Heinrich and his protégé, Amadeus, as they step inside Cornelius's fighting pits. Their minds were already set before entering his tournament: today, the tyrant falls!
703100.name: Family Feud

703200.desc: Ninmah uses quite a mysterious power to travel through time. Why? To assess what her progeny will bring to the world, and to make a difficult choice!
703200.name: The End is the Beginning

703300.desc: Arthur has but one goal: to bring Viviane back to life. In order to do this, he has found a powerful ally: Lancelot. But how far will he go in order to bring back his beloved?
703300.name: Where does Love lead?

703400.desc: Dear Prince, would you kindly help me to bring the snow in my country? It's always too hot... And snow is so beautiful! It shines!
703400.name: The benefactor of winter

703500.desc: Jake’s desire for ruin allowed him to become the right-hand man of Coal Cauldron. He’s sent to investigate who might be connected with the rebel Blink in this village: a decisive mission.
703500.name: The Suspicious Village

703600.desc: Iaroslava still hasn't joined a squad as the deadline approaches quickly. However, it just happens that Team C is looking for one last member...
703600.name: Last Chance

703601.desc: While Iaroslava has been part of Team C for a while, everything is not going as she had hoped.
703601.name: The Lone Huntress

704000.desc: Strange beings lurking in the darkest corners of this graveyard... Some believe their powers are there for the taking! Play this Dungeon and you may win powerful Units!
704000.name: Graveyard of Souls

704100.desc: 20 years after Arthur's death, an anomaly amongst certain robots has begun to threaten the Kingdom. Accompanied by the young and loyal Lancelot, King Perceval sets off on his quest.
704100.name: A turbulent arrival

704101.desc: Perceval and Lancelot have become separated during the struggle and now Lancelot is surrounded by a group of particularly aggressive robots.
704101.name: Alone in battle

704102.desc: Still apart, Perceval is getting closer and closer to the robot troops, which seem to constantly be increasing in number.
704102.name: Royal clashes

704103.desc: Perceval and Lancelot are both making progress. Perceval is trying to locate the mastermind behind the robots; however, the area appeared barren. He will be quick to move on.
704103.name: The robot troops

704104.desc: Lancelot is very close to King Perceval, but he is now at the heart of the robot army. The enemies are increasing in numbers, making it difficult to advance.
704104.name: Alone in the sandstorm

704105.desc: Perceval and Lancelot finally managed to reunite. Now they need to find and neutralize the mastermind behind the rebellion in order to stop the robot troops.
704105.name: At the heart of the robot army

704106.desc: There are more mechanical troops than ever. It would appear that their leader is not too far away.
704106.name: Robot revelation

704200.desc: Galahad had been greatly damaged during the fighting. Perceval decides to bring him with them. Time to make a decision on what to do.
704200.name: The Damaged Robot

704201.desc: The path of the Technology Center goes through the Lakes Region, a region that is normally quite calm.
704201.name: The Lakes Region

704202.desc: The monsters are as aggressive as ever, increasing in number. The advance will not be as easy as anticipated.
704202.name: Robotic Wanderings

704203.desc: The road to the Technology Center is long. If the monsters continue to slow down Perceval and Lancelot, there isn't much chance Galahad will be fixable anymore.
704203.name: An Unexpected Arrival

704204.desc: Viviane will examine Galahad, but she needs time and, moreover, not to be disturbed. It will be necessary to repel the monsters, which continue to increase in number!
704204.name: Sea Monsters

704205.desc: Viviane has been examining Galahad for some time already. The monsters do not seem to want to leave you alone.
704205.name: Repair and revelation

704206.desc: It seems the mystery surrounding Galahad's behavior may yet be solved. Viviane only needs a bit more time.
704206.name: The Deep Memory

704300.desc: Galahad’s Recording 01: Arthur learned that the demons' activity in the region had been increasing for some time. He thus decided to head to their lair to investigate.
704300.name: The Encounter

704301.desc: Galahad’s Recording 02: Arthur continued to advance through the demonic lair, looking for answers to his questions.
704301.name: The Quest

704302.desc: Galahad’s Recording 03: After some searching, the demon that had pursued Arthur was detected once again. Arthur then continued tracking in this direction.
704302.name: Tracking

704303.desc: Galahad’s Recording 04: Confused by the demon’s words, Arthur asked many questions. Still, he continued his quest for answers.
704303.name: Doubt

704304.desc: Galahad’s Recording 05: Arthur calmed down. His determination allowed him to continue on his journey. He was ready to fight the demon.
704304.name: The Decision

704305.desc: Galahad’s Recording 06: The choice is made. It is too late to turn back. Arthur’s destiny awaited him.
704305.name: Destiny

704306.desc: Galahad’s Recording 07: The clash between Arthur and the demon is now inevitable.
704306.name: The Clash

704400.desc: Perceval realizes the danger that the demon in Galahad's memories represents. He thus entrusts Lancelot with a new mission.
704400.name: New Mission

704401.desc: Perceval and Viviane return to Neo Avalon in order to organize the town's defenses. Meanwhile, Lancelot heads for the forest, where Merlin should be.
704401.name: Separation

704402.desc: Lancelot hears a strange voice call out to him. Who could it be...?
704402.name: Strange Mountains

704403.desc: The voice does not stop. However, Lancelot ignores it and continues to advance. The stakes of his mission are way too high.
704403.name: An Unsettling Voice

704404.desc: This encounter with Mordred's ghost troubles Lancelot. Memories of events from the rebellion against Arthur flood his mind.
704404.name: Memories

704405.desc: Lancelot continues along the path towards the forest. He gets ready for his next encounter with the chimera.
704405.name: The Ghost

704406.desc: The edge of the forest is now visible. Lancelot knows what awaits him, and he prepares to fight.
704406.name: Past

704500.desc: Lancelot finally arrives at the forest Viviane mentioned, but it is infested with monsters. The path onward looks arduous.
704500.name: A Path

704501.desc: Lancelot heads towards the voices that emanate from the depths of the forest, hoping to find Merlin and quickly fulfill his mission.
704501.name: Espionage

704502.desc: The voices emanating from the forest are now very close to Lancelot. He approaches carefully in order to not be spotted.
704502.name: Demon

704503.desc: Lancelot finally found Merlin, but he seems to be co-operating with the demon. What is this plan Merlin is speaking about?
704503.name: Pursuit

704504.desc: Merlin takes flight and progresses further into the forest. For the sake of his mission and his kingdom, Lancelot swiftly pursues him.
704504.name: Depths of the Forest

704505.desc: More determined than ever, Lancelot continues to follow Merlin. A strange feeling suddenly takes over the intrepid soldier.
704505.name: Motivation

704506.desc: Lancelot understands then that, in reality, Merlin was testing him. He is now ready to pass this final test.
704506.name: Revelation

704600.desc: Merlin and Lancelot return to Neo Avalon in order to find Perceval and Viviane. Upon their arrival, the town is besieged by a horde of demons.
704600.name: Town Under Siege

704601.desc: Anxious yet supported by Lancelot, Merlin manages to make a break through the waves of demonic creatures. Will they be able to reach the palace in time?
704601.name: Concerns

704602.desc: Merlin and Lancelot reached the palace. Their abilities will be tested once again. So, what is this hope that the powerful wizard had alluded to…?
704602.name: The Wizard’s Plan

704603.desc: Merlin finished charging the armor with the power of the Grail. By activating it, will Viviane reach her destination? Will she be able to change the past?
704603.name: Save the Past

704604.desc: Viviane succeeded in returning to the past. She must hurry in order to find and save the bearer of Excalibur.
704604.name: Searching for the King

704605.desc: Although she is making progress, the time traveler worries that she will not arrive in time. Nevertheless, her sensors go off…
704605.name: Time is Running Out

704606.desc: Viviane catches up with Arthur and Mordred, who are entangled in a fierce battle without mercy. Will she succeed in protecting the King from the fatal wound that is destined for him?
704606.name: Change the Past

704607.desc: Viviane believed that she failed her mission; however, Merlin’s plan was more complex. There is another Excalibur user to save…
704607.name: A New Continuity

704700.desc: Mordred has become King and the kingdom prospers. Nevertheless, he has increased the region’s military presence due to Viviane’s warnings. The menace she spoke of seems to be very close...
704700.name: A New Menace

704701.desc: Viviane hurries towards the forest where Merlin is. According to Viviane, he holds the key that will allow them to vanquish Enquibedes.
704701.name: A Cry for Help

704702.desc: Meanwhile, Gwenevere detects Enquibedes’ presence. Accompanied by Lancelot, she chases after him.
704702.name: The Demon Hunt

704703.desc: Gwenevere and Lancelot continue on their path towards the Demon. Their route is scattered with demons. However, Gwenevere’s motivation will not yield for something so trivial.
704703.name: The Path of Vengeance

704704.desc: Gwenevere and Lancelot finally arrive at the battlefield where Mordred’s forces clash with the demon horde. Gwenevere becomes riled up at thought of finding Enquibedes.
704704.name: Reunion

704705.desc: Viviane and Merlin return to the battlefield with a plan to defeat the Demon.
704705.name: Race Against Time

704706.desc: Mordred, Merlin, and Viviane go back into combat against Enquibedes. They find Gwenevere and Lancelot already embedded in battle with the Demon.
704706.name: Fateful Clash

704800.desc: Viviane’s temporal shift was not without consequence. The Pact that Morgana had made with Enquibedes was corrupted.
704800.name: Rupture of the Pact Lv. 1

704801.desc: Viviane’s temporal shift was not without consequence. The Pact that Morgana had made with Enquibedes was corrupted.
704801.name: Rupture of the Pact Lv. 2

704900.desc: There's a strange atmosphere in this place. A test awaits you…
704900.name: Romantic Stroll Lv. 1

704901.desc: A mysterious knight wants to test you again. But, what is he up to?
704901.name: Romantic Stroll Lv. 2

704902.desc: The knight awaits you for one final confrontation… Are you up to the challenge?
704902.name: Romantic Stroll Lv. 3

705000.desc: Learn to harness the power of Fire and Thunder with a sparring match versus Mai and Benimaru! Are you ready for this?
705000.name: Burning Electrocution

705001.desc: Learn to harness the forces of Water and Earth with a sparring match against Kula and Terry! Are you going to be okay?
705001.name: Granite Undertow

705002.desc: Learn to harness the energy of Light and Dark with a sparring match against Athena and Iori! Care to wager on your odds?
705002.name: Scintillating Darkness

705003.desc: Time to put your skills on the line in a royal rumble fit for legends! Embrace the elements and let them guide you to victory!
705003.name: Two Enter, Only One Leaves

705100.desc: Coal Cauldron’s band has taken power. However, the rebels seek to liberate the Bad Lands. Two of them, Plumatachi and Sesir, are sent to find Techs in the desert.
705100.name: Tech Hunting

705101.desc: The mutants continue to increase in number and a sandstorm picks up. Perhaps the mission will not be as easy as expected.
705101.name: Unexpected Obstacles

705102.desc: The Techs are very close now. The only obstacle between Plumatachi, Sesir and their goal is the number of mutants.
705102.name: Cry for Help

705103.desc: Plumatachi, Sesir, and Jake returned to the town of the rebellion. At the town’s entrance, some of Coal Cauldron’s men block their path.
705103.name: City Under Siege

705104.desc: The group succeeded in getting around most of Coal Cauldron’s troops, who were too occupied with pillaging the warehouses. They now arrive at the center of the town.
705104.name: Despair

705105.desc: None of Coal Cauldron’s troops have left the rebel city. A General stands in the middle of the street. He appears to be very strong.
705105.name: The General

705200.desc: Sesir guides Plumatachi and Jake through a strange area. Rumors say that one of Coal Cauldron’s allies is located somewhere here.
705200.name: A Strange Cemetery

705201.desc: With a heavy heart, Plumatachi continues to walk alone through the cemetery.
705201.name: A Lone Path

705202.desc: Jake and Sesir go to look for Plumatachi. The sky becomes clouded and rain starts to fall.
705202.name: On Track

705203.desc: Plumatachi becomes lost in the cemetery. However, she is far too determined to reach her goal to stop here.
705203.name: The Encounter

705204.desc: Gazolina guides Plumatachi to the cemetery exit to find their two companions. They prepare for the attack on their next target.
705204.name: Trust

705205.desc: Strange voices and lights emanate from the ship graveyard. It is said that if anyone goes there at midnight, they will come across something terribly frightful.
705205.name: Cursed Wreckage

705300.desc: The group guided by Gazolina arrives at the lair of Crash Belt, one of Coal Cauldron’s generals.
705300.name: The Sky King

705301.desc: Plumatachi and her group continue onward through what seems to be an immense landfill. All sorts of vehicles from ancient times are scattered throughout.
705301.name: An Explosive Plan

705302.desc: Following Jake’s plan, the group heads for the place he indicated.
705302.name: The Landfill

705303.desc: Jake starts to plant explosives by the generator. The group must protect him while he finishes up.
705303.name: Sabotage

705304.desc: Plumatachi finally finds herself before Crash Belt. She shivers with anticipation at the idea of killing him.
705304.name: The First General

705305.desc: A smuggler had been using the generator’s energy in order to create Techs that he sold to the highest bidder. He will not let you go without making you pay for his losses.
705305.name: The Arms Dealer

705400.desc: The group arrives at a large plain where a tribal festival is taking place. The sound makes the ground vibrate for kilometers around.
705400.name: The Tribal Festival

705401.desc: While the group becomes drawn into the tribal festival, they hear sounds of combat emanating from not far off.
705401.name: Unexpected Encounter

705402.desc: Plumatachi went ahead and the rest of the group now tries to rejoin her. However, Voodoo’s men seem not to want to let them advance.
705402.name: The Newcomer

705403.desc: The group has still not caught up with Plumatachi. They continue to move through the tribal festival, surrounded by Voodoo’s troops.
705403.name: Mud and Mutants

705404.desc: Finally, the center of the festival. The music is stronger here than anywhere else. Everything vibrates from the power of the bass.
705404.name: A Sad Ending

705405.desc: Jake is on the ground, not moving... However, Plumatachi doesn’t change her mind. She wants to eliminate Voodoo.
705405.name: Separation

705406.desc: The music stops. In this silence, your group makes too much noise and is quickly noticed. One mutant in particular seems to not want you to leave.
705406.name: A Disturbing Silence

705500.desc: Sesir has left the group, but this doesn’t shake Plumatachi’s unwavering drive. Accompanied by Natalamé and Gazolina, she arrives at Pig Bull’s fort.
705500.name: The Mission Continues

705501.desc: The group continues to infiltrate the fort, destroying one by one the waves of henchmen that Pig Bull assembles in their path.
705501.name: The First Warlord

705502.desc: Natalamé goes ahead, alone, in order to find Pig Bull. The henchmen in her path don't seem to pose much of a thread to her.
705502.name: Infiltration

705503.desc: Plumatachi and Gazolina continue along their path, but they don’t find any trace of the famous Warlord.
705503.name: Sinister Fortress

705504.desc: Plumatachi and Gazolina soon arrive at Pig Bull’s lair. The showdown is inevitable.
705504.name: Lies

705505.desc: While exploring the fort, you come across Pig Bull’s two most powerful henchmen. They don't seem to want to let you leave.
705505.name: The Two Generals

705600.desc: Pig Bull recounts what actually happened during Coal Cauldron’s attack on Blink’s fortress.
705600.name: Invaders

705601.desc: Blink and Natalamé continue to push back waves of henchmen in order to allow the survivors time to escape. However, it seemed that Coal Cauldron himself was about to arrive.
705601.name: The Tyrant

705602.desc: Coal Cauldron’s forces are too powerful and great in size. Blink decides to retreat. She and Natalamé retreat towards their village.
705602.name: Escape

705603.desc: Finally arriving at the village, Natalamé and Blink discover that Coal has sent his troops after them. Having nowhere to hide, fighting is their last resort.
705603.name: Massacre

705604.desc: Natalamé can no longer stand Blink’s way of doing things. She prepares herself to do what she knows best… Kill.
705604.name: Truth

705605.desc: Following her wrongdoings, Natalamé went looking for Coal Cauldron and her generals to kill them. Unfortunately, she could only find the rearguard..
705605.name: Moving Forward

705700.desc: Plumatachi thus learns the truth directly from Pig Bull. A new target has just been added to her list.
705700.name: Betrayal

705701.desc: Pig Bull is now dead, but this is of little importance to Plumatachi. She pursues her new target, who is headed towards Coal Cauldron’s fortress.
705701.name: Pursuit

705702.desc: The two warriors progress through the fortress, destroying the waves of henchmen in their path.
705702.name: Infernal Heat

705703.desc: The number of henchmen only increases. The tyrant isn’t much further away. Plumatachi no longer responds to reason. Blinded by rage, she shoots at anything that moves.
705703.name: Despot

705704.desc: Coal Cauldron is no more. Blink’s assassin stands before Plumatachi. The latter trembles with excitement at the thought of exacting her vengeance.
705704.name: For Blink!

705705.desc: Plumatachi’s vengeance is complete. However, one person who helped Coal Cauldron in the past still remains and Plumatachi intends to finish what she started.
705705.name: Last Victim

705900.desc: Infiltrate gumi Europe and defeat Elie, the mighty English Community Manager to discover the latest news and secrets of Brave Frontier RPG.
705900.name: An ordinary day at gumi Europe

705901.desc: Frustrated that they can't make bad jokes every day, Elie and friends set out on a rampage to create chaos. MWAHAH- oh please somebody help us!! please! - gimu
705901.name: Elie & Friends UNLEASHED!

706000.desc: In this temporarily stabilized part of the Rift, one can find the power of evolution!
706000.name: Isle of Evolution

706001.desc: In this temporarily stabilized part of the Rift, one can find the power of experience!
706001.name: Isle of Experience

706002.desc: In this temporarily stabilized part of the Rift, one can find the power of wealth!
706002.name: Isle of Wealth

706003.desc: In this temporarily stabilized part of the Rift, one can find the power of knowledge!
706003.name: Isle of Knowledge

706004.desc: In this temporarily stabilized part of the Rift, one can find the power of growth!
706004.name: Isle of Growth

706005.desc: In this temporarily stabilized part of the Rift, one can find the power of shards!
706005.name: Power Island

706100.desc: Sedrac dedicates his life to researching and analyzing different Rifts. Lately, however, he’s observed some strange phenomena… What could be the cause of all this?
706100.name: Anomaly

706200.desc: Sedrac and Alvitr arrive in Valhalla and quickly find the other Valkyries present: Eir, Thrud, Svafa, and their queen Freyja. Valhalla seems to be plunged into chaos.
706200.name: A Familiar Face

706201.desc: Sedrac and Eir go to the east in order to push back the invaders. Along the path, they meet up with some individuals who should not be there...
706201.name: Return of the Missing People

706202.desc: Sedrac tells Freyja the news. The queen has her group fight the invaders in that area and she joins up with Sedrac’s unit.
706202.name: A Strange Machine

706203.desc: Surt, the god of fire, is challenging you. Prove you're worthy of the title of Hero in the world of Valkyries.
706203.name: The Champion's Challenge

706300.desc: Sedrac and Aymarks arrive in the Mirror World. Unfortunately, times are not calm. The problems that the Valkyries faced appear to be present here as well.
706300.name: Return Home

706301.desc: Sedrac and his group seek out Magena’s attacker while Tuanregguj accompanies the group for safety. Might fate grant him the chance for redemption?
706301.name: Amnesia

706302.desc: Auhlavez is finally free, but Aymarks notices that Sedrac seems a little off. Nevertheless, another metallic structure is in sight and there’s no doubt that powerful guardians will be there.
706302.name: Recovered Memories

706303.desc: Auhlavez, Master of Wisdom, challenges you. Prove yourself worthy as a hero of the Mirror World.
706303.name: Champion’s Challenge

706400.desc: After returning Magena to her world, Sedrac remained in the mirror world. He stayed in contact in order to provide her with guidance so she could save her world.
706400.name: The Warrior’s Rage

706401.desc: Once Plumatachi returned to her world, Sedrac reconnected with Magena’s group. Sedrac had again detected an immense source of power...
706401.name: Parents and Children

706402.desc: Gilgamesh, now in charge, guides the team of Shapeshifters towards the machine. However, Ninmah doesn’t seem glad to see her father again...
706402.name: Past and Future

706403.desc: Gilgamesh, emperor from the past, challenges you. Show yourself worthy to be a hero of the world of Shapeshifters.
706403.name: The Champion’s Challenge

706500.desc: While Sedrac finishes resolving the situation with the Shape-shifters, the Warlord Coal Cauldron opens his eyes and discovers he
706500.name: Meanwhile

706501.desc: Sedrac managed to find a group of travelers who might be more receptive. However, he is interrupted by a poignant reunion.
706501.name: Couple(s)

706502.desc: Sedrac guides the group of women, now bolstered by the presence of Sheriff and Cobalt. All that remains is to destroy the infamous machine, but is trust strong enough?
706502.name: Goodbye

706503.desc: Sheriff, protector of the innocent, challenges you. Prove yourself worthy of being a hero of the world of Bad Lands.
706503.name: Champion’s Challenge

706600.desc: After saving the Bad Lands, Sedrac tried to renew contact with Viviane. Receive no reply, he decided to go visit the young woman’s world.
706600.name: Where is she?

706601.desc: The Lancelot from alternative Arthur's world has joined the group. Will Sedrac be able to convince him to cooperate?
706601.name: Kings and a Queen

706602.desc: A strategy is devised. The metallic structure will be attacked on two fronts. Will Sedrac manage to save this world without mishap?
706602.name: On Two Fronts

706603.desc: Utheria, undefeated champion, challenges you. Show yourself worthy of being a hero of the world of Neo Avalon.
706603.name: Champion’s Challenge

706700.desc: Viviane tells Sedrac what happened after her departure from the Bad Lands.
706700.name: Captured and Saved

706701.desc: Sedrac and Viviane move through the Rift in order to reach an unknown area. Their journey is not without peril...
706701.name: Heroes and the Herald

706702.desc: After destroying Yggdrasil, Sedrac decides to leave in order to search for heroes from each world while Viviane leads the troops at the frontlines.
706702.name: Back to the Roots

706703.desc: Ophiuchus, zodiacal champion, challenges you. Prove yourself worthy of being a hero of the constellations.
706703.name: Champion’s Challenge

706800.desc: Sedrac and the Apex have arrived in the enemy’s stronghold. It is located in a secret area of the Rift. However, needless to say, the path is fraught with peril.
706800.name: Mirror’s Reflection

706801.desc: The final battle approaches! Sedrac will finally find out who is hiding behind this voice...
706801.name: Goddess of the Trinity

706802.desc: When all seems lost, hope returns when an ally intervenes. Will this be enough to stop the Goddess of the Trinity?
706802.name: Paternal Support

706803.desc: Htilit, Goddess of the Trinity, defies you. Prove yourself worthy of being a hero capable of saving the universe.
706803.name: Goddess’s Challenge

706900.desc: While peace reigned in the tiny village of Domrémy, forces from the sea prepared to attack. A new invasion begins...
706900.name: The final stronghold

706901.desc: Some Shapeshifters attack the village, while others chase the villagers who have run away into the forest. They were not expecting to encounter any resistance...
706901.name: Hunt in the forest

706902.desc: Amadeus and Heinrich arrive in the village mentioned by the villager girl. All that is left to do is to find the famous young girl.
706902.name: Strange young girl

706903.desc: The attack on the village has been interrupted. The group now launches an offensive in order to push back the invaders.
706903.name: Counterattack

706904.desc: Village folk stories speak of a creature who lives in the depths near the village. Some strange noises have been heard recently... Perhaps the stories are true...?
706904.name: Marine monster

707000.desc: By the shore, Heinrich, Amadeus, and Jeanne chase the last Shapeshifters that are trying to escape. In their flight, they leave behind a strange clue.
707000.name: Don’t Leave Anyone Behind!

707001.desc: Once they find a map, the hunters set off for an unknown island where Cornelius was.
707001.name: On Cornelius’ Trail

707002.desc: The hunters decide to separate into two groups in order to wipe out all the Shapeshifters on the island.
707002.name: Purification of the Island

707003.desc: Once reunited, the group heads to the west of the island in order to finish the total purification.
707003.name: The End of an Era

707004.desc: The hunters located the Shapeshifter who tried to attack Hamilincourt. She appears ready for anything. This fight does not seem easy.
707004.name: The Master of Animals

707100.desc: Just as Robespierre, a politician known throughout Hamelincourt, decides to visit the town square, he suddenly has a vision.
707100.name: Dark Omen

707101.desc: After his vision, Robespierre continues on his way to confront Condorcet.
707101.name: New Determination

707102.desc: When Robespierre fights Condorcet, their battle is interrupted by the Hamelincourt guards.
707102.name: Inflamed Situation

707103.desc: After freeing the prisoners, Robespierre decides to go up against the Hamelincourt captain.
707103.name: Hamelincourt Uprising

707104.desc: On the way to Lutèce, the hunters meet up with some Shapeshifters who caught wind of the Hamelincourt rebellion.
707104.name: Widespread Rumor

707200.desc: The group moves towards the capital, Lutèce, now that Robespierre has joined them.
707200.name: A Dangerous Path

707201.desc: While Robespierre runs to the aid of the villagers, the rest of the group tries to catch up with him.
707201.name: Change of Plans

707202.desc: Separated now from the rest of the group, Heinrich and Amadeus take care of eliminating the Shapeshifters located in the South of the village.
707202.name: The Master and the Student

707203.desc: Each pair having completed its task, they all regroup at the village’s exit.
707203.name: Trap and Plot

707204.desc: Rumor has it that a terrible creature roams the forests surrounding Lutèce. Could it be a Shapeshifter?
707204.name: Rumor from the Forest

707300.desc: The group of hunters finally arrives at the capital of Lutèce. But unfortunately, the city is being attacked by Shapeshifters.
707300.name: Power of Knowledge

707301.desc: After running into Emily, the group finally reaches the palace. There’s a stronger Shapeshifter presence here... The President is surely in danger.
707301.name: Presidential Rescue

707302.desc: Heinrich received the support that he needed, but he leaves the group in order to find an informer in the forest. The role of group leader is therefore left to Robespierre.
707302.name: The Beginning of Change

707303.desc: Robespierre, accompanied by Emily and Jeanne, infiltrates the Lutèce Palace. The revolution is unfolding...
707303.name: The Revolution

707304.desc: Robespierre has now taken control. However, the most faithful knights of the former president disagree with this change...
707304.name: The Loyal Knights

707400.desc: While Robespierre takes power in Lutèce, Heinrich heads towards his rendez-vous point. However, the journey onward promises to be difficult…
707400.name: A Winding Forest

707401.desc: Unable to bear watching his master set out on what could be a trap, Amadeus rushes after Heinrich.
707401.name: His Own Path

707402.desc: Amadeus approaches the rendez-vous point. Heinrich seems to already be at the location when Amadeus catches bits of a conversation…
707402.name: Revelation

707403.desc: As the Lavinias take their last breath, Amadeus thinks he’s finally done with fighting. Then, suddenly, a strange man arrives at their location…
707403.name: Clash of Horns

707404.desc: The majority of wild animals avoid certain areas of the forest. Could powerful predators be located there?
707404.name: The Depths of the Forest

707500.desc: It’s been several months since Robespierre came to power, yet some people still refuse to recognize him as ruler. He therefore sends his most faithful soldier to take care of the problem...
707500.name: Dirty Work

707501.desc: Jeanne and Emily heard that a village had been attacked and they arrive there, before Admiral Nelson. The female hunters then discover the Admiral’s true motives.
707501.name: Shameful Secret

707502.desc: Jeanne and Emily managed to convince Nelson to join them and they set off again for the capital in order to put an end to Robespierre’s terror.
707502.name: Last Hope

707503.desc: Jeanne, Emily, and Nelson arrive in the capital and head directly to the palace with a sense of déjà vu. The final clash against Robespierre is drawing near.
707503.name: Déjà Vu

707504.desc: Emily had read that an ancient system of pathways exists in the sewers, but no one has ever dared to try it out.
707504.name: Ancient Mystery

707600.desc: The fight for internal power in the Republic is now over. However, in the floating kingdom, Cornelius prepares to use his new weapon: Cosette.
707600.name: A New Future

707601.desc: Dream World - After Cornelius’ training, Cosette has now reached an immense level of power. A level much higher than that of Cornelius...
707601.name: Revenge is a Dish That’s Best Served...

707700.desc: Welcome to Grand Gaia School, the most renowned institute in the world. On your schedule, you see that you begin with History class...
707700.name: History Class

707701.desc: After this first captivating class, you head to the playground. Along the way, someone from the school staff stops you.
707701.name: Recess

707702.desc: After your encounter, you realize that you just missed recess. You just have one class left: Biology.
707702.name: Biology Class

707703.desc: Monsters are invading Grand Gaia School. May the strongest students come to its aid!
707703.name: Homework

707800.desc: Take part in the (incredible and scary) Super Spookfest organized by (the generous, beautiful and humble) Htilit, and use your spooky items to craft spooky spheres!
707800.name: Htilit's Super Spookfest

707801.desc: Aha, you've discovered the Spookfest's secret area! If you're brave enough, join us for even more loot! Who knows, maybe you'll get a special rare item in there... Tee-hee-hee!
707801.name: Htilit's Frenzy Farmfest

708000.desc: It's a big day at Siegfried Academy: the second-year students have gone dragon hunting. Natasha has broken away from her group; she's most likely following a fresh lead...
708000.name: Not a good start...

708001.desc: Two members of the squad have finally found each other. They set off hunting again.
708001.name: Something new for the squad

708002.desc: The hunting comes to an end; several squad members have almost found their prey. Who will get to it first?
708002.name: Everything for glory

708100.desc: After their failure, Natasha and Daria decided to skirt around the rules of the Academy in order to obtain points to climb back up the rankings.
708100.name: Lack of trust

708101.desc: The three girls continue to follow the trail of their prey. The level of cooperation between Tatiana and the other two members doesn't seem to be all that great...
708101.name: Welcome to the squad

708102.desc: The three girls reach their prey's lair; Tatiana's strength should ensure their victory. But a silhouette is lurking in the shadows...
708102.name: The forbidden hunt

708200.desc: The girls will have to face the consequences of their evening escapade. What does the captain have reserved for them?
708200.name: The Punishment

708201.desc: The four girls all have very different personalities and find themselves obliged to cooperate. Will Natasha and Iaroslava make efforts so that everything goes well?
708201.name: Back on the Trail

708202.desc: The dragon's roar seemed very powerful, even for an ancient Alpha. The Captain appears to be very tense. However, an Alpha dragon should not overly concern her…
708202.name: More Than Just an Alpha

708300.desc: Despite their adventure with the Omega dragon, the girls' daily routines didn't change much at all: class, practicals, stressing out for exams...
708300.name: Return to Normalcy

708301.desc: Finals week has arrived, along with new anxiety attacks. Especially since the girls have not been allowed to stray from the Academy for awhile.
708301.name: A Bit More Crowded

708302.desc: It's the final sprint. The exams are very close and the girls work relentlessly. They fall to sleep late at night, their books in their laps.
708302.name: Night Terror

708400.desc: The Academy has been badly damaged by the Omegas' attack: the entire west wing has been destroyed and is now uninhabitable. The students have been entrusted with restoring the Academy.
708400.name: The Eastern Mountains

708401.desc: The Regional Center for Plant Life Studies of the Eastern Mountains has been abandoned for many years. They carried out research there, aiming to improve the equipment used by hunters.
708401.name: Center for Plant Life Studies

708402.desc: The last news the Center reported was that they had completed their work and were thus closing their doors. The Academy approved this decision and the Center gradually fell into ruins.
708402.name: Strange Studies

708500.desc: The adventure in the laboratory had an unexpected effect: Iaroslava became friends with the rest of the squad. Certain adventures can create bonds you might have thought were unimaginable.
708500.name: The Notebook

708501.desc: Despite the numerous dragon attacks around the world, lessons continue for the students at the Academy. These students are the hope and future of all hunters-to-be.
708501.name: Final Lesson

708502.desc: Following the latest dragon attack, Natasha and the others cannot run away any more and they must face the dragons as a last resort...
708502.name: Last Chance

708503.desc: Defeated by the Omegas, will the heroic attack carried out by Natasha and the others be enough for them to reach the other world?
708503.name: After the Battle

708600.desc: Months after the destruction of Siegfried Academy, one of its professors explores a city in ruins. The outbreak of dragons makes the survival of humans very difficult.
708600.name: Alone in the Rubble

708601.desc: A heavily armed young woman also arrives in the city. Her mission? To find provisions in order to ensure the survival of her group.
708601.name: In Search of Provisions

708602.desc: Hearing roars in the distance, Aleksandra hastens in order to face the last of the dragons in the city.
708602.name: Not-So-Esteemed Professor...

708603.desc: The Omega moves closer and closer. Aleksandra will have to put aside her resentment in order to team up with Olga.
708603.name: First and Foremost, Protection

708700.desc: During the Convergence, Htilit was vanquished by the Apex. However, it would appear that she survived. She will make the acquaintance of a very special little girl…
708700.name: The Little Girl with Divine Power

708701.desc: Htilit has Lucy travel through time and space. Together, they discover many worlds, but will this be enough to keep the littlegirl entertained?
708701.name: Change of Heart

708800.desc: Our famous presenter, Elie, is exceptionally hosting our Special 2017 Parade. Join us to relive our favorite moments of 2017!
708800.name: Let the Parade begin!

708801.desc: It wouldn't be a worthy Parade without petits fours and other delicious appetizers! Come capture tons of Evolution Units, as well as the 2017 Jewel of Remembrance, in this mission.
708801.name: Banquet and petits fours

708900.desc: Julia gathered all the soul mates of this world inside of the Temple of Love. However, it would appear that an unwanted guest has also joined the couples...
708900.name: An Intruder amongst Lovers

708901.desc: Chocolates are scattered throughout the Temple of Love! Collect them in order to craft and improve Julia and Sergio character spheres!
708901.name: Sweet Treats

709000.desc: Run through fire and lava to get the power of Ignis Shards !
709000.name: Fire Wing

709001.desc: You should resist the Blizzard to win the Algor Shards
709001.name: Water Wing

709002.desc: Can you explore the entire forrest and fing the Terra shards ?
709002.name: Earth Wing

709003.desc: After fighting storms and lightning, you're about to get the Fulgur Shards
709003.name: Thunder Wing

709004.desc: You have to overcome the purity of Light to get the Lux Shards
709004.name: Light Wing

709005.desc: Don't be afraid of darkness, the Umbra Shards are nearly...
709005.name: Dark Wing

709700.desc: Htilit is yet again in an odd situation... Will she manage to resolve the problem with Elie?
709700.name: The Goddess, the Eyebrows, and the Hat

709800.desc: A light wind arrives to Grand Gaia, swirling Spring Petals around! Collect them to craft the Spring Shard!
709800.name: Spring Ballad

709801.desc: The wind blows harder and even more Spring Petals are flying in the sky! Catch them quickly!
709801.name: Spring Blossom

709900.desc: Natasha and her companions have perished in combat! But it seems that the plan is working as anticipated...
709900.name: The Other World

709901.desc: Natasha and her companions are in Valhalla. And they are in the presence of a goddess who appears to know a lot about the dragons...
709901.name: Divine Audience

709902.desc: Goddess Frigg has a plan. Will the hunters from the Academy be able to execute it?
709902.name: The Origin of the Dragons

710000.desc: Frigg decides to tell a story about the past, explaining how everything began… But she is interrupted by a familiar face!
710000.name: Best Friends

710001.desc: While Htilit and Lucy are gone, Frigg tells her story. A story about an ancient god of Valhalla…
710001.name: The First Valkyrie

710002.desc: Frigg continues her story and reveals the origin of many tragic events…
710002.name: Divine Judgment

711000.desc: Some time after the events of the Convergence, Sedrac searches for answers. Like most people, he had forgotten what had happened...
711000.name: What is the Question?

711001.desc: Meanwhile, the world of the Shapeshifters seems to be menaced by some mysterious warriors. An alliance could help, but...
711001.name: Two Opposing Sides

711002.desc: Natasha and her team leave for the world of the Academy. A disturbance was felt from Valhalla...
711002.name: The Survivors

711100.desc: Ragnarok approaches... The alternate realities are also in danger! Will the power of two Apexes be enough?
711100.name: Apex Duo

711101.desc: Ragnarok approaches... An alternate version of Enki with boundless ambition decides to act...
711101.name: The League of Tyrants

711102.desc: Ragnarok approaches... An alternate version of Crash Belt has managed to assemble individuals from many different worlds, but will he be able to make them a team?
711102.name: The Explorer without Charisma

711200.desc: Evil mock units and dragons now invade all of worlds within the Rift. Frigg has a solution, but you’ll need to stall for time!
711200.name: The Gungnir Wielder

711201.desc: Enquibedes has returned to spread discord! Lucy tries to work things out...
711201.name: Unpardonable

711202.desc: Another group has joined the coalition, but time is of the essence! The dragons have broken through and are getting close to Iaroslava!
711202.name: A Dangerous Reunion

711300.desc: No one can stop Aleksandra! The best huntress in the Academy takes it upon herself to go and find Iaroslava, who was kidnapped by Enquibedes.
711300.name: Precious hostage

711301.desc: Enquibedes doesn’t seem bothered by dragon Goddess Llewxam’s arrival. Is his plan unerring?
711301.name: Return of the forgotten Goddess

711302.desc: The alliance formed by the champions of the worlds within the Rift is facing the imminent Ragnarok. Will they be brave enough to face it?
711302.name: All together

711303.desc: Lucy had an idea, but did she succeed… ?
711303.name: The miracle of friendship

900000.desc: The strange musician and the girl who listened to him. It seems their songs are helping the tree to grow.
900000.name: Out the Window Lv. 2

900001.desc: The tree grows as if it was being fed by the instruments. Could its branches reach to where the girl came from?
900001.name: Out the Window Lv. 3

900002.desc: A light shines on the stairs within a closed room. What truth awaits the amnesiac girl who is slowly recovering her memory...?
900002.name: Out the Window Lv. 4

900010.desc: The moon shines beautifully in the night as you feel a strange sort of magic about you. Two beings wrapped in cherry blossoms await you atop a bridge.
900010.name: Sight of Sound Lv. 2

900011.desc: The two seemingly possessed beings continue to battle under the blooming evening blossoms. Could their iron will be hiding something more within?
900011.name: Sight of Sound Lv. 3

900012.desc: As the battle rages on, the two beings' ornate garments turn as red as the evening blossoms. A hint of innocence can be seen behind their gloomy eyes.
900012.name: Sight of Sound Lv. 4

999999.desc: Apa tekadmu bulat? Aku selalu siap bertanggung jawab, sampai jiwaku yang terdalam!
999999.name: Test_Evo_Item_Drop Lv. 1

1000000.desc:
A mysterious area that suddenly appeared in the Vortex.
On orders from the Akras Summoners’ Hall, hunters are being sent to investigate the area and rid it of monsters.
1000000.name: The Domain of Despair

1000230.desc:
ゲートの狭間に突如出現した謎のエリアの入口付近。
奥に比べ弱い魔物が多いとはいえ油断は禁物だ。
1000230.name: 未開拓領域・序地

1000231.desc:
ゲートの狭間に突如出現した謎のエリアの中部付近。
未開拓な領域となるこの地で待ち受けるものとは……。
1000231.name: 未開拓領域・中部

1000232.desc:
ゲートの狭間に突如出現した謎のエリアの奥地。
そこには中部を遙かに越える凶悪な魔物が待ち受けていた。
1000232.name: 未開拓領域・奥地

1000233.desc:
ゲートの狭間に突如出現した謎のエリア奥地のさらに先。
大気を震わすほどの壮絶な圧力が召喚師に襲いかかる。
1000233.name: 未開拓領域・極地
