5000000.desc:
Shortly after defeating Maxwell, one of the Four Fallen Gods, Karl suddenly appears to ask the Summoner's help in defeating a dragon.
Not only is this dragon quite strong, but it is said to flee the second it senses danger.
The Summoner and Karl plan a strategy to prevent the dragon from running away, when suddenly...
5000000.name: Demonic Agitation

5000001.desc:
After the crisis in Cordelica, the Summoner and Karl run into Lugina, who has a special request from Summoners' Hall.
He says they are to survey a great forest where the treasure of an empress is hidden.
The Summoner and Lugina take different routes to reach the same forest, but end up running into each other on a third route where they spot Paris...
5000001.name: Proud Soldier's Feast

5000002.desc:
Not long after defeating Zevalhua, one of the Four Fallen gods, Karl and Seria show up to ask the Summoner for help in defeating Graham, the demon they have been after for so many years.
As the three of them reach the region Graham oversees, many of his sly traps lie in waiting unbeknownst to them.
5000002.name: Cobalt Spirit's Waking

5000003.desc: After defeating Maxwell, the Summoner receives an urgent request from Akras Summoners' Hall. The Demon Algmos has been spotted and a squad has been sent to slay him, but Seria ignored orders and went to seek him out alone. The Hall wants you to bring her back safely.It seems Algmos's decimation of a squad Seria had led in the past started it all...
5000003.name: The Crimson God's Cry

5000004.desc: After facing Lucius, the Summoner receives a request from Elder Grahdens.He wants the Summoner to defeat the Demon Mashreed as a training exercise. However, Mashreed is not the only demon in the area, as there are many others in the mix.Grahdens is ready to wipe the floor with these demons, but it seems he has some particular expectations in mind.
5000004.name: The Old Dawn General

5000005.desc: Shortly after defeating Maxwell, one of the Four Fallen Gods, the Summoner receives a mission from Lin. She wants to use her mechanical tools to survey a territory that seems to be connected to Grand Gaia, and wants the Summoner to act as her bodyguard. Thus, the two leave together on their journey, unexpectedly running into many monsters along the way...
5000005.name: Lin's Long Day

5000006.desc: Having defeated Lucius, Paris takes a moment to herself in the Imperial Library when Noel appears. He says there is a place where she can find her true self, and thus she sets off on a journey there. While on her way, she runs into the Summoner who's in the area, though she decides to continue on her own. However, another sudden meeting turns the tables...
5000006.name: Virtual Garden

5000007.desc: Moments after defeating the sealed god Lucius, Noel sends the Summoner on a mission along with Lugina. However, the demon they are after has the ability to reflect the souls of its opponents, unexpectedly drawing Lugina into a fierce battle with his doppelganger. Meanwhile, Karl is on a mission in the area under orders from Grahdens, but...
5000007.name: Warped Reflection

5000008.desc: During the great war with the gods, Palmyna suffers an invasion from the troops led by Cardes the Malevolent. With the kingdom facing a terrible danger, Princess Edea dons the enchanted armor Lafdranya and sets off on a journey to meet companions Lorand, Loch, and Dean. Together they join the rest of the royal army and head towards the last battle.
5000008.name: Gathering Hope

5000009.desc: After a fierce battle, Edea and her friends succeed in sealing Cardes away. However, the price paid to accomplish this was far too high, as Princess Edea has fallen into a deep slumber. Having been scattered in different directions by Edea's powers, her friends begin regrouping in order to save her. The three believe there is still hope.
5000009.name: Four Heroes of Palmyna

5000010.desc: Not long before the great war with the gods, a young lady from the La Veda Republic called Michele witnessed a strange dark object fall from the sky. After meeting Duel-GX and learning that it has come from another world chasing the winged armor "Melchio," which had been destroying neighboring towns, Michele begins her journey to destroy Melchio...
5000010.name: Ten-Winged Tormentor

5000011.desc: Not long after Maxwell's defeat, Noah and the Summoner decide to accept a new Raid mission. However, since Elise has taken the day off from her duties as the receptionist, she's not there. Owen then suddenly appears to report that a demon has appeared on the mountain where Elise and her friends are having a picnic. She must be saved as soon as possible...
5000011.name: Hopes & Regrets

5000012.desc: Just before the great war with the gods, the Guardians of Meirith receive new orders. They travel to Ishgria in order to defeat the demon Ragruvord, who is attempting to invade Grand Gaia. However, before they can confront him, a messenger appears from the gods. They hear that someone is after Karna Masta, and are ordered to return to Grand Gaia immediately.
5000012.name: The Correct Path

5000013.desc: The 7 leaders of the Akras Summoners' Hall Demon Slayers--Griff, Iris, Kafka, Rhoa, Libera, Krantz, and Mirfah--head to the world of Ishgria to survey the land. However, they face an enormous demon soon after arriving. Their leader, Griff, goes after the demon alone. As acting commander, Krantz leads the rest to where the return gate should be, but...
5000013.name: Entrusted Will

5008002.desc: The tracks of the mysterious kidnapper have led Avani to Ostagoth, capital city of the Morokai. Just what do they have planned for Ezra?
5008002.name: Eneroth: Genesis

7000000.desc: These mock Units are made of something completely different. You're in for a shock once you start fighting them!
7000000.name: Skalmold's Trial

7000001.desc: These mock Units are made of something completely different. You're in for a shock once you start fighting them!
7000001.name: Trial Yggdrasil

7100000.desc: These mock Units are made of something completely different. You're in for a shock once you start fighting them!
7100000.name: Trinity's Challenge

7100100.desc: These mock Units are made of something completely different. You're in for a shock once you start fighting them!
7100100.name: Enki's Challenge

8301001.desc: You have arrived at the tower where the formidable monster is rumored to be dwelling. It's dark and the cold, still air sends a chill up your spine.
8301001.name: Unholy Tower Floor 1-10

8301131.desc: You've been sent to check on the phenomena caused by newcomers from beyond the "Backyard." Are you ready for wild dragons and thunderstorms?
8301131.name: A Revelating Survey

8301132.desc: More newcomers have arrived, including a strange two-winged girl, and her blond companion. They claim to be looking for a friend in a wedding gown...
8301132.name: Dizzying Golden Locks

8301133.desc: Two more deadly beauties have arrived. Is it heaven, or hell? Only one thing's for sure--your heart might just be Overdrived into an Instant Kill!
8301133.name: Explosive Brawl

8301134.desc: Turns out Elphelt was just looking for eternal love. It's a beautiful day for a wedding, and she looks lovely in her gown. Time to declare your love!
8301134.name: A Grand Reception

8301144.desc: Fairy Tail wizards have appeared through an anomaly in the vortex. They seem to think you're with a "Dark Guild." What's going on?!
8301144.name: Through Fire & Ice

8301145.desc: Be careful! Lucy and Erza have joined the battle, and it looks like they're siding with the others. When will this misunderstanding end?!
8301145.name: Let There Be Light

8301146.desc: Seems like Fairy Tail isn't backing down from an offensive stance. You've got one shot to help them understand things, so make it count!
8301146.name: Towards Fantasia

8301147.desc: A disturbance has appeared in Ishgria--a mysterious door has opened to a Dark realm. What could be going on?
8301147.name: Origin of Darkness

8301148.desc: Near the gate, a shadowy figure appears. Who is he, and just what are his intentions?
8301148.name: Darkness Within

8301149.desc: The shadowy figure near the gate turns out to be Mard Geer, from the same world as Fairy Tail. Will your efforts be enough to stop him?
8301149.name: Tartaros

8301190.desc: Unexpectedly, a rather typical meadow can be seen on the other side of the gate. Sounds in the distance imply a battle is happening nearby.
8301190.name: The Will Of Man Lv. 1

8301191.desc: A battlefield lies ahead. Arrows fly over your head as metal clings against metal, all accented with a hint of magic. You must fight your way through.
8301191.name: The Will Of Man Lv. 2

8301192.desc: A young knight with red hair has spotted you and confused you for the enemy. You may only leave by beating him in a duel, or by becoming his prisoner.
8301192.name: The Will Of Man Lv. 3

8301201.desc: A powerful force has invaded Grand Gaia through the Vortex Gate. The Summoners' Hall has called upon you to investigate this "Veritas of the Dark."
8301201.name: An Explosive Disaster

8301202.desc: The man called Veritas of the Dark is growing stronger! You must fight back until the reinforcements from Summoners' Hall reach you!
8301202.name: A New Darkness Arises

8301203.desc: This is it! The combined effort of every hero is needed to defeat the enemy. With your help (and a little luck), victory will come soon enough!
8301203.name: Fighting for the Light

8301204.desc: Oh no! Snow Miku's lost her way! Good thing you're here to help, Summoner! But be careful not to hit her, okay? Aim only for the bad guys!
8301204.name: Lost in Transition

8301205.desc: Great job, Summoner! Now all you have to do is escort our young guest to--wait, where is she going? What is that in the distance?!
8301205.name: The World Is A Stage

8301206.desc: Almost there, Summoner! It's time for the performance of a lifetime! Miku, take it away!
8301206.name: A New Beginning

8301221.desc: When she heard of the beautiful cherry blossoms in Grand Gaia, Senbonzakura Miku knew she had to see them for herself. Her journey's just begun...!
8301221.name: Miracle Star Song

8301222.desc: Meanwhile, a concert is already underway in a forgotten forest. Miku presses on and soon realizes she isn't the only singer in this bizarre world...
8301222.name: Cherry Blossom Concert

8301223.desc: As the two singers' voices resonate in unison, the snow begins to make way for a new spring. Whose voice shall echo for all eternity?
8301223.name: Sweet Spring Encore

8302001.desc: Now that you've met the guardian of the tower, you start to feel less confident about this mission. What else lurks in the darkness?
8302001.name: Unholy Tower Floor 11-20

8303001.desc: So far so good, nothing you can't handle as of yet, but the spooky howls coming from the higher levels of the tower is something you can't ignore...
8303001.name: Unholy Tower Floor 21-30

8304001.desc: What's that?! A dark shadow just flashed past behind you. Or was it just your imagination? Stay alert, Summoner.
8304001.name: Unholy Tower Floor 31-40

8305001.desc: How many floors has it been? It's getting darker and the rain isn't stopping. Gleaming eyes are watching you from behind the shadows…
8305001.name: Unholy Tower Floor 41-50

8306001.desc: Watch out for the beasts and monsters, they haven't had a decent meal in ages… let your guard down and you might not live to see the sun rise again.
8306001.name: Unholy Tower Floor 51-60

8307001.desc: Your breathing seems heavier than before. Are you getting tired from the climb, or is the guardian of the tower pushing you to your limits?
8307001.name: Unholy Tower Floor 61-70

8308001.desc: He is hot on your heels, catching you at every turn and landing. You need to hurry! The ominous aura filling the air is getting thicker by the minute.
8308001.name: Unholy Tower Floor 71-80

8309001.desc: You can't let him get in your way now! You've come so far, the truth waiting to be unraveled is just a reach away…
8309001.name: Unholy Tower Floor 81-90

8310001.desc: You've reached the top of the tower!... Or have you not? It's too dark to see, but you can clearly sense a strong power beckoning in the darkness…
8310001.name: Unholy Tower Floor 91-100

8311000.desc: There is nothing more worth fighting for than justice. She will not hesitate to launch her missiles at anything she deems unrighteous.
8311000.name: Flames of Justice Lv. 1

8311001.desc: Wait… what the cursed knight has been fighting to guard wasn't the tower? What he was trying to protect was… what's that?!
8311001.name: Unholy Tower Floor 101-110

8311006.desc: Hero of the Agni Empire, Vargas' strength and blazing sword lit the flame in the people's hearts to believe that they had a chance against the gods.
8311006.name: Hero of Agni Lv. 1

8311999.desc: Frustrated that they're always being picked on, Burny and friends set out on a rampage to create chaos. MWAHAHAHA!
8311999.name: Burny & Friends UNLEASHED! Lv. 1

8312000.desc: When she is angered, only destruction awaits. Stand in her way and be prepared to get blown away.
8312000.name: Flames of Justice Lv. 2

8312001.desc: It only took the monster a single strike to take down the knight you fought so hard against?! Are you sure you can take on the monster?
8312001.name: Unholy Tower Floor 111-120

8312006.desc: His immense powers were feared even by the gods. Even long after he left the empire, he was remembered by its people as the legendary swordsman of Agni.
8312006.name: Hero of Agni Lv. 2

8313000.desc: Sparks fly as her war rockets blow her enemies away. Her passion for justice burns stronger than ever.
8313000.name: Flames of Justice Lv. 3

8313001.desc: Now that Xenon is injured, you're the only one who can contain the monster. Hurry, before it escapes the tower!
8313001.name: Unholy Tower Floor 121-130

8314001.desc: Oh no! You lost sight of the monster! Where is it? There's no time to waste… you need to track it down before it can ambush you!
8314001.name: Unholy Tower Floor 131-140

8315001.desc: The darkness is putting you at a great disadvantage, but you can hear the monster's heartbeat from a distance. Wait, was that your own heartbeat instead?
8315001.name: Unholy Tower Floor 141-150

8316001.desc: The continuous climb and seemingly endless battles have taken a toll on you, but your mission is not over. Xenon is pinning his hopes on you, Summoner.
8316001.name: Unholy Tower Floor 151-160

8317001.desc: Is that the best you can do? You need to muster more energy and power to complete this mission! Pull yourself together and charge forth!
8317001.name: Unholy Tower Floor 161-170

8318001.desc: The monster seems to be getting stronger and stronger. Can you keep up? If you give up now, it's not going to leave a nice impression on your record…
8318001.name: Unholy Tower Floor 171-180

8319001.desc: There's no time to rest! The monster must be getting exhausted too, this is your chance to attack! Did you lose sight of it again?
8319001.name: Unholy Tower Floor 181-190

8320001.desc: It has been a long, tough fight. You're so close to completing your mission! You're not going to give up now, are you?
8320001.name: Unholy Tower Floor 191-200

8321000.desc: Cool and dignified, she bows to no one but her trusty gatling gun which she has entrusted her life to.
8321000.name: Waves of Fury Lv. 1

8321001.desc: Xenon & Estia revisit their past of wandering the wilderness together, after escaping from their burning kingdom in search of allies to regroup..
8321001.name: Reminisence

8321006.desc: Beautiful yet strong, Selena was admired by many for leading the Savat people of the Sama Kingdom to countless victorious battles.
8321006.name: Heroine of Sama Lv. 1

8322000.desc: Known as the Gun Lady, she never lets her guard or her gun down. When it comes to the quick draw, she is second to none.
8322000.name: Waves of Fury Lv. 2

8322001.desc: In the following months after escaping the gods, they survived and adapted to dangers, slowly forging a special relationship going against all odds that lie before them.
8322001.name: Lost Innocence

8322006.desc: Refusing the call from her kingdom, Selena instead wielded her treasured sword Lexida and cut down god after god to rescue the masses.
8322006.name: Heroine of Sama Lv. 2

8323000.desc: It's no longer a matter of winning or losing. She wants revenge and she wants it fast. She has no time for those who can't keep up.
8323000.name: Waves of Fury Lv. 3

8323001.desc: Defeated but finally freed, the couple wonders if their bond is still as strong as the past.
8323001.name: Duo of Virtue

8331000.desc: She doesn't have the slightest clue about her past, but she knows one thing well and clear. She needs to get stronger.
8331000.name: Nature's Wild Child Lv. 1

8331006.desc: Picking up the Sacred Pike Drevas, Lance gave up his roots as a noble of the Principality of Vriksha to pursue greater skill and power.
8331006.name: Hero of Vriksha Lv. 1

8332000.desc: The mountains are more dangerous than they look, but nothing will stop her from sharpening her senses as well as her claws.
8332000.name: Nature's Wild Child Lv. 2

8332006.desc: Lance stood up against the gods, but he was not alone. He had his awakened Demon Pike Drevas, which now held the powers of World Tree Altro.
8332006.name: Hero of Vriksha Lv. 2

8333000.desc: "Never underestimate a cat," she always warns, and those who cross her only realize it when they feel her claws dig in.
8333000.name: Nature's Wild Child Lv. 3

8341000.desc: Being able to prophesy, the only way she could keep going despite the dreadful war was to smile and keep fighting.
8341000.name: Bolts and Bombs Lv. 1

8341006.desc: Eze trained and fought hard as a  warrior and was rewarded with the Thunder Sword Batootha, which gave him the destructive power of thunder.
8341006.name: Hero of Atharva Lv. 1

8341999.desc: A storm has been brewing across the vast skies of Grand Gaia, and where there is a storm, thunder is bound to follow.
8341999.name: Thunder Turnout Lv. 1

8342000.desc: Though she lost her memory, she didn't lose her spark and will to fight, her grin only widening as she got stronger.
8342000.name: Bolts and Bombs Lv. 2

8342006.desc: Eze tore down the gods with his Thunder Sword Batootha and his superior speed, rescuing Goddess Emilia and the masses during the great war.
8342006.name: Hero of Atharva Lv. 2

8342999.desc: Do you hear the thunder? It's coming for you. They're coming for you. Can you thrive above the lightning, or will you kneel to their bolts of power?
8342999.name: Thunder Turnout Lv. 2

8343000.desc: A fortune-teller knows that there's no way to change fate. The only way to win is to laugh and make merry. Fight-oh!
8343000.name: Bolts and Bombs Lv. 3

8350401.desc: As the sunny days approach, furry creatures come out to play.
8350401.name: Easter Fanfare Lv. 1

8350402.desc: Furry creatures bear gifts and little surprises for travelers from distant lands.
8350402.name: Easter Fanfare Lv. 2

8350403.desc: Gifts and surprises don't come with ease, furry creatures live to tease.
8350403.name: Easter Fanfare Lv. 3

8350404.desc: Celebrate the joy of spring time with even more furry creatures than before!
8350404.name: Easter Fanfare Lv.4

8351000.desc: While others struggle on the ground, she soars through the sky to wherever the light reaches, and fights for those who seek freedom.
8351000.name: The Holy Sky Mech Lv. 1

8351006.desc: Gifted with extraordinary skills, Atro was known as the "Sword Saint" for his brilliant technique with the legendary Light Sword Urias.
8351006.name: Hero of La Veda Lv. 1

8352000.desc: If death can't stop her, nothing will. As long as there is a ray of light, she'll trace it down, even to Gaia's end.
8352000.name: The Holy Sky Mech Lv. 2

8352006.desc: When the gods destroyed the monastery he grew up in, he drew his sword and unleashed the unearthly powers of Urias, going all out against the gods.
8352006.name: Hero of La Veda Lv. 2

8353000.desc: Stronger, higher, faster. Whoever said the sky's the limit obviously never met Vanila. To this airborne warrior, the sky is but the starting line.
8353000.name: The Holy Sky Mech Lv. 3

8361000.desc: The half-demon daughter of a dark lord is always seeking thrill to feed her restless blood. Battle Maidens? Sounds like fun.
8361000.name: Demon Blade of the Dark Lv. 1

8361006.desc: As a cavalry leader's son, Magress was a talented young knight. Triggered by his defeat to his father, he honed his skills and soon became the strongest in Bariura.
8361006.name: Hero of Bariura Lv. 1

8362000.desc: Nothing bores her more than incompetent, weak fighters. The demon in her is telling her to fight to survive, devour to succeed.
8362000.name: Demon Blade of the Dark Lv. 2

8362006.desc: Wielding a gigantic lance, he could effortlessly pierce through the thickest of armor. Even the gods couldn't stand in his way.
8362006.name: Hero of Bariura Lv. 2

8363000.desc: She doesn't care if a human, god or demon stands in her way. Her demon blade will only stop for someone who excites her… but only for brief while.
8363000.name: Demon Blade of the Dark Lv. 3

9103000.desc: A knight who once led a refugee escape from Grand Gaia to Elgaia. What could he be thinking now that he has shown himself once again?
9103000.name: Guiding Knight UC1

9103001.desc: The sword that once protected people during the war with the gods is now pointed in your direction. And with it, stern eyes that seem to test you.
9103001.name: Guiding Knight UC2

9103100.desc: A martial artist from the Toltya Dojo that protected those headed to Elgaia. Having regained his many secret techniques, now he stands in your way.
9103100.name: Martial Artist UC1

9103101.desc: The secret techniques of the Toltya Dojo defeated countless gods during the great escape. This master's eyes look towards the future, ready to battle.
9103101.name: Martial Artist UC2

9103200.desc: The youngster who planned the escape from Grand Gaia to Elgaia. Once she makes use of her brilliant intellect once again, how will it affect this era?
9103200.name: Friend Power UC1

9103201.desc: The eyes of the youngster who used her intellect to help her dear friends now stare at you silently. A strong will lies deep within them.
9103201.name: Friend Power UC2

9103300.desc: A young magician who guided the people after receiving a divine revelation from the gods. Could the will of the gods have brought her back as well?
9103300.name: Holy Revelation UC1

9103301.desc: The childhood friends that once fought by her side are no longer present. And yet she looks forward, believing in the dawn of a new era.
9103301.name: Holy Revelation UC2

9103400.desc: A heavily armored knight who saved many people during the escape to Elgaia. The white armor that once protected many now obstructs your path.
9103400.name: Light the Way UC1

9103401.desc: A strong soul that aided those who led the escape to Elgaia. One to look towards the future, his past remains a mystery. What path will he show you?
9103401.name: Light the Way UC2

9103500.desc: A knight from the Bariura Empire who defied the emperor and led his people to Elgaia. Bearing great pride, his soul has descended to Elgaia once more.
9103500.name: Twilight Pride UC1

9103501.desc: Though you seek peace for Grand Gaia, the ire he once held during the duel with his knight companion over their plan of escape is now directed at you!
9103501.name: Twilight Pride UC2

9103600.desc: The six heroes who guided the people to El Gaia now obstructs your path. They want to test you!
9103600.name: Heroes of the past UC1

9103601.desc: The final challenge for El Gaia arrived, can you defeat the six heroes in a row?
9103601.name: Heroes of the past UC2

9103700.desc: A dark and evil force, the Corruption, has overwhelmed Valhalla and has corrupted its inhabitants. It now threatens all of Gaia. Do you have what it takes to defeat its supreme herald?
9103700.name: First contact

9103800.desc: The vortex opens. You recognise this outlandish place, once again you’re back in the strange and anarchic future.
9103800.name: Return to the Bad Lands Lv. 1

9103801.desc: Coal Cauldron apparently still rules over the surrounding area with his gang, but he seems worried. There’s no trace of his ally, Gazolina, at his side.
9103801.name: Return to the Bad Lands Lv. 2

9103802.desc: The members of Coal Cauldron’s gang are being hunted down. Will the area soon be free from their yoke?
9103802.name: Return to the Bad Lands Lv. 3

9103803.desc: Gazolina is fleeing. Coal Cauldron has been taken down. Just who is this "Plumatachi"?
9103803.name: Return to the Bad Lands Bonus Lv.

9103804.desc: Plumatachi finally has Gazolina in her sights, but something odd is happening. Constellations are lighting up...
9103804.name: Return to the Bad Lands Lv. 4

9103901.desc: A prophecy tells of the awakening of the queen of the demigoddesses. It seems about to be fulfilled!
9103901.name: Prophecy of Valhalla Lv.1

9103902.desc: The queen has returned! She will bring back order to Valhalla, but for that, she needs help from an ancient ally.
9103902.name: Prophecy of Valhalla Lv.2

9104000.desc: Fighters from another world want to see your power! Face them head on!
9104000.name: Sparring Match Lv.1

9104001.desc: Fighters from another world want to see your power! Face them head on!
9104001.name: Sparring Match Lv.2

9104002.desc: Fighters from another world want to see your power! Face them head on!
9104002.name: Sparring Match Lv.3

9104003.desc: Fighters from another world want to see your power! Face them head on!
9104003.name: Sparring Match Lv.4

9104100.desc: After taking a bite of a strange fruit, you find yourself at the deepest end of the Vortex... Here, the flow of time is all but still. Survive and you might gain access to forbidden Summons!
9104100.name: The Slave who could hear the Spirits

9104101.desc: Verses from an old scripture - Extract 1: "...the Fallen were punished because they failed to follow the rules of the Creator [...] only 2 were forgiven..."
9104101.name: Fallen Arena of Obedience I

9104102.desc: Extract 2: "...say that 6 is the number of the Fallen [...] 6 is forbidden [...] should have exercised restraint in their lust for power..."
9104102.name: Fallen Arena of Obedience II

9104103.desc: Extract 3: "Every 10 centuries, the Creator judged if they respected [...] but they were growing too fast [...] mark of fate follows Enki's choice [...] a wish for duality slows time down."
9104103.name: Fallen Arena of Obedience III

9104104.desc: In the Arena, Enki gets back up, seemingly not injured by his battles, but with something different in his behaviour. The rules of battle, too, have changed.
9104104.name: Rebirth of the Slave

9104200.desc: Using his machines and dark rites, Merlin is attempting to bring back something, or someone, to his world... He had better not be disturbed!
9104200.name: Setting up the Plan Lv. 1

9104201.desc: Using his machines and dark rites, Merlin is attempting to bring back something, or someone, to his world... He had better not be disturbed!
9104201.name: Setting up the Plan Lv. 2

9104400.desc: Shusui, the most combative of the eight demon lords, is always looking to defend his title, and his life. Be ready to go into battle.
9104400.name: “The Most Powerful”

9104500.desc: Mora, the demon with many faces, is hatching another plan to take power. Prepare to thwart her.
9104500.name: “The Most Vile”

9104600.desc: Beiorg has evolved even more since your last encounter. This form seems beyond imagination. Have you also progressed enough?
9104600.name: “The Most Changeable”

9104700.desc: Melord has the strongest will out of the eight demon lords. Even after Lucius’ betrayal, his loyalty remains unfailing to his master. Will you be able to open his eyes?
9104700.name: “The Most Faithful”

9104800.desc: Mordlim has always shown a strong interest in human technologies, but also a poor opinion of their creators. Will you be capable of proving her wrong?
9104800.name: The Most Aware

9104900.desc: Despite his choice to use his power to protect Ishgria, Kalon never says no to a challenge. Will you be up to it and entertain him for a while?
9104900.name: The Wisest

9104910.desc: Considered the strongest and oldest demon of the 8 of them, Amu Yunos is expecting a worthy distraction. Let's hope that isn't your only purpose.
9104910.name: The Eldest

9104950.desc: Barion the demon dragon is a just and honorable king, despite the brutality he can sometimes show. Will you meet the honorable king or the brutal and ultra-powerful fighter?
9104950.name: “The Most Honorable”

9105000.desc: The Omega Dragons are the most powerful dragons in the world. It takes several years of experience after graduating from an Academy to hope to be able to contend with them.
9105000.name: Bida, Cruel Dragon

9105100.desc: Long ago, dragon hunting was a pastime reserved for wealthy families. However, their proliferation has forced authorities to open up the hunt to all classes in society.
9105100.name: Sacred Dragon Graoully

9105200.desc: Researchers are studying the behavior of dragons and some of them have found that each dragon behaves in a different way. One of these studies even defined them as “humanoids”.
9105200.name: Balaur, Persecuted Dragon

9105300.desc: Omega dragons are anomalies of nature. They look immortal and don't seem to have any ancestors. A lot of researchers are trying to figure out where they come from.
9105300.name: Mokele-mbembe, dragon of the river

9105400.desc: Some dragons have lived together for so long that their consciences have become one. This makes them formidable as their group acts as a single entity.
9105400.name: The three Dragons of the South

9105500.desc: Some Omega dragons are completely disconnected from their fellow dragons. They live amongst themselves, are self-sufficient and no one dares to approach them.
9105500.name: Ancient glories

9105600.desc: For Valentine's Day, Julia decided to challenge you and she is calling the strongest couples of different worlds to assist her in the fight !
9105600.name: Struck by arrows of love

9106000.desc: Raven and Wolf... Each has found a way to fight off enemy attacks.
9106000.name: The Wolf and The Raven I

9106001.desc: They are bound by love... They could not bear to lose one another.
9106001.name: The Wolf and The Raven II

9106002.desc: The crow is so powerful that some heroes have no choice, they must bow to her...
9106002.name: The Wolf and The Raven III

9106003.desc: Only then, at the height of her power, can you try and reach the forbidden Ravenna summon!
9106003.name: The Dreadful Lovers I

9107000.desc: Full of vitality, the wolf looks for a fight. However, when he’s weakened, the raven will protect him.
9107000.name: The Wolf and The Raven IV

9107100.desc: If one of them falls, the other will make sure you're next.
9107100.name: The Wolf and The Raven V

9107200.desc: They are counting your actions. You’ll need to find that balance between brandishing your shield and unleashing your power.
9107200.name: The Wolf and The Raven VI

9107300.desc: Only then, at the height of her power, can you try and reach the forbidden Randolph summon!
9107300.name: The Dreadful Lovers II

9108000.desc: You are now facing the Valhalla Sovereign. Measure your actions, or they will lead you to Ragnarok...
9108000.name: Timeless challenge

9700800.desc: The Portal that once led you to the northern territories and the mirror world just opened again... where will it lead us this time?
9700800.dungeon: Journey Out of Town: Mirror Mode
9700800.name: Journey Out of Town Lv1

9700801.desc: A strange world. A race of Shapeshifters use their powers to enslave all other races and call themselves the Noblesses.
9700801.dungeon: Journey Out of Town: Mirror Mode
9700801.name: Journey Out of Town Lv2

9700802.desc: A strange plot develops between the Noblesses. Men have been found beheaded. Who is the culprit?
9700802.dungeon: Journey Out of Town: Mirror Mode
9700802.name: Journey Out of Town Lv3

9700803.desc: You found the secret! Countess Jade of the Cruel Forest and The Crimson Fort has a bad habit of beheading her suitors... Maybe you could "suggest" her to stop.
9700803.dungeon: Journey Out of Town: Mirror Mode
9700803.name: Journey Out of Town Lv4

9701100.desc: The vortex opens in front of you. A new world, another time, a desolate future where it’s all about survival of the fittest.
9701100.name: Bad Lands Lv. 1

9701101.desc: This strange and anarchic future makes you restless. The area seems to be dominated by a close-knit and well-trained band of rogues, bent on looting the remaining resources.
9701101.name: Bad Lands Lv. 2

9701102.desc: The leader of this band seems to like you. They are soon going to launch their final raid against a city in the midst of the dunes.
9701102.name: Bad Lands Lv. 3

83510001.desc: A strange eclipse, an unfamiliar silhouette. He who holds the key has tapped into a long lost power, a hypnotic force that is spread across Grand Gaia.
83510001.name: The Keymaster's Eclipse Lv. 1

83520001.desc: Dark and light, good and evil...can you maintain balance, or will you give in to the Keymaster's magic? The force of the eclipse is growing...
83520001.name: The Keymaster's Eclipse Lv. 2
